description:
WE ARE NOW TATA CONSUMER PRODUCTS EFFECTIVE FEBRUARY 10TH, 2020. 

PLEASE VISIT OUR NEW PAGE "TATA CONSUMER PRODUCTS" FOR ALL THE LATEST UPDATES.


Tata Global Beverages is a global beverage business; our brands have a presence in over 40 countries. With significant interests in tea, coffee and water, we are the world’s second largest tea company.

We believe passionately in making the world a better place through life-enhancing sustainable hydration - and it’s our mission to make this a reality. What do we mean by ‘life-enhancing sustainable hydration’? Put simply – beverages which taste good, are good for you, good for others and good for the planet.

Tata Global Beverages unites the beverage interests of the Tata Group under one umbrella, underpinned by Tata’s philosophy of “leadership with trust”. We are a business with rich heritage and huge ambition. 

Tata Global Beverages’ annual turnover is US$1.4bn from our JV’s and associates; 330 million+ servings of our brands are consumed every day around the world.. We have a stable of innovative regional and global beverage brands, including:  Tata Tea, Tetley, Himalayan natural mineral water, Tata Water Plus and Tata Gluco+, Good Earth tea, Grand Coffee and Eight O’clock coffee. For more information please visit www.tataglobalbeverages.com.

description: The Tea Spot is a leading producer of handcrafted whole leaf teas and the creator of Steepware®—innovative teawares that make healthy tea effortless and accessible. This for-profit philanthropic business is fueled by the passion of our founder, a cancer fighter drawn to tea for its reputed health benefits during her recovery. Her message is simple and powerful: tea in its freshest form renders incredible flavor, unmatched benefits, and is eco-friendly. Diverse tea-drinking rituals and history remind us that tea connects us with billions of people around the globe. We pay tribute to this age-old beverage, and hope to enlighten and enliven those who consume it. The Tea Spot is committed to a culture of giving with every sale we make. 10% of all profits are donated to wellness programs around the world. To date, we have donated more than 10 million cups of tea.
name: The Tea Spot

description:
Live Boldly. Sip Wisely with Barnie’s Coffee & Tea Company

Congratulations! You've stumbled upon something extraordinary. 

Founded in 1980 in Winter Park, Florida, Barnie’s Coffee & Tea Co. pioneered sourcing high quality fair trade coffee beans from around the world. Those green beans were roasted and flavored and served and sold at a Cafe on historic Park Avenue in Winter Park, Florida. This coffee cafe concept was Starbucks before Starbucks. The company became highly successful and was and is known for the world famous Santa’s White Christmas blend. 

Forty three years later Barnies roasts thousands of pounds of coffee and sells more than 17 different coffee flavors and Cold Brew to hundreds of thousands of customers from a modern 12,000 square foot Production and Distribution Center in Orlando, Florida. Barnie’s Coffee & Tea Co. consumer products offer a market-leading selection of packaged, single-serve K cup and 12 oz ground and whole bean coffees and tea on e-commerce online platforms such as Amazon and our website and in select grocery stores. 

In addition to Barnie’s flagship café on Park Avenue in Winter Park, Barnie's has partnered cafes at the University of Central Florida Hitt Library, Orlando International Airport Terminal C, Stetson University, Seminole County Schools, and the Orlando Science Center.
name: Barnie's Coffee & Tea Co.

description:
Welcome to Wild Ohio Brewing, headquartered in Columbus, Ohio. Our company thrives under the guidance of individuals deeply passionate about the fusion of artistry and scientific precision in the creation of exceptional vegan, gluten-free hard tea. 🍹 ✨
 
Our approach revolves around exacting standards and an unwavering commitment to quality. Our journey begins with the formulation of bespoke recipes, meticulously refined over months of experimentation, evaluation, and refinement. However, our pursuit of excellence extends beyond recipes. The transformation from a concept to a consummate hard-tea experience hinges on our selection of premium ingredients and adherence to a specialized brewing process.🌟🏆
 
Thanks to the unwavering support of our valued patrons, dedicated team, and esteemed business partners, we have emerged as one of Ohio's most rapidly expanding producers of hard tea.
 
Join us in our journey to redefine the art of beverage creation. At Wild Ohio Brewing, we invite you to be part of our legacy of quality, creativity, and unparalleled taste!🥂
name: Wild Ohio Brewing

description:
Orimi Trade company achieved successful results in hot beverages business. The focus on the corporate own brands, on maintaining the highest product quality at affordable price brought its results.

At present Orimi Trade is the leader of the Russian tea market with the largest market share. The number of origin countries supplying tea to the company includes Ceylon, India, Indonesia, China, Kenya and Vietnam. Accordingly to the information of the independent research agencies more than 30% of all tea sales in Russia falls on the brands "Greenfield", "Tess", "Princess Noori", "Princess Gita", "Princess Kandy" and "Princess Java". It means that each third cup of tea drunk in Russia is produced by Orimi Trade.

In 1999 in line with its strategy of expansion on the hot beverages market Orimi Trade offered to the Russian consumers roast coffee under the brand "Jockey". Later the range of the coffee products was expanded with  brand "Jardin". At present the market share of the coffee sold under own brands "Jockey" and "Jardin" amounts to 30% of the Russian roast coffee market. The company purchases green coffee beans in over 15 countries, the major suppliers being Brazil, Bolivia, India, Indonesia and Columbia.

Orimi Trade has wide distribution in Russia and exports the production to more than 20 countries worldwide.
name: Orimi Trade

description:
Introducing Ohtea, the premium tea brand that brings the best teas from Asia straight to your cup. Our passion for tea drives us to search for the finest teas from the most renowned tea-growing regions in Asia, carefully crafting them to provide a truly exceptional tea-drinking experience.

Ohtea is more than just about the tea. We're committed to promoting cross-cultural understanding and appreciation, sourcing our teas from independent farmers who take pride in their craft. By working closely with them, we guarantee the highest quality and preserve traditional tea-growing techniques.

Since launching in 2019, we've served over 150k customers both online and offline across the US and are now expanding to Canada and the UK. Our goal is to make authentic milk tea and fruit tea accessible to more people, anytime and anywhere, regardless of geographical or time constraints. Join us in exploring the rich and diverse world of Asian teas!

description:
Silk Road Teas is known as a purveyor of rare and artisan teas and tisanes. Each spring, we travel in the tea-rich southeastern provinces of China to source many of our teas. Visiting tea markets, small farms, specialty tea companies and tea brokers, we find the finest varieties of white, green, oolong, black and Pu-erh tea. 

The teas we offer are grown and processed by true artisans of the leaf. We purchase most of our teas in small lots that are single origin and often handmade. It is our belief the best tea is harvested early in the spring, when the days are warming and the nights cool. In that brief harvest window, known as "before the rain" teas, the fresh and tender leaves offer nuanced flavors and tastes. These teas are limited in supply and are recognized as some of the finest teas in the world. Once plucked and processed, many of our teas are not blended and we preserve these unique small lots for our customers' enjoyment.

It is also worth noting that teas grown on small and specialty tea farms tend to use traditional methods of farming. As these teas are harvested in the spring before insect predation begins, the use of chemicals and pesticides is far less prevalent than on teas harvested later in the season and on larger farms. We make every effort to find farms practicing natural and organic methods. As China's consumer market continues to strengthen and demand for organic products grows, we increasingly source third-party certified organic teas to complement our line of traditionally grown teas. To encourage and complement organic farming, our business is a certified USDA NOP Organic Handler.

We sell to well-known U.S. tea companies, tea shops, specialty grocery, coffee companies and fine restaurants - purveyors of high-end, specialty teas throughout the United States and Canada, and directly to online customers.
name: Silk Road Teas

description:
Hoop Tea is more than just a handmade alcoholic beverage. It is summer in a jar. Sunlight, held together by water and tea leaves.​
​Brewed by the sun and steeped in the salty air, Hoop Tea is crafted on the beach of Ocean City Maryland. Each ingredient is hand picked and blended using our original recipes. We take great pride in creating the world's finest "spiked & skinny" beverages right here on the beautiful shoreline of America.
​We use natural ingredients, purified water, organic cane sugar, and a thousands of years old process of fermenting natural sugars from steeped grains to create alcohol.
Our flavors are as free spirited and fun loving as our hometown. We choose the highest quality tea leaves, herbs, fruits, and flowers. We never add artificial colors or imitation flavorings. Real ingredients create unreal flavor.
We promise to deliver you a beverage that will quench your thirst and feed your soul. Thank you for joining us in pursuing our passion. It's what we were put on this earth to do.
name: Hoop Tea

description:
The Air Tea Company is reimagining tea by building the world’s first single use herbal tea vaporization platform. This pod-based system allows consumers to conveniently enjoy a variety of craft herbal tea blends from our partners. 

The Air Tea platform is a lucrative co-branding opportunity for wellness companies in the herbal tea blend space, where we partner with popular brands to fill TeaCups™, single serve herbal blends, for the Air Tea Pot™, a state-of-the-art herbal tea vaporizer. 

Are consumers ready for a change?

Tea has not changed for over 100 years. The way your great, great grandparents drank tea is the still the way people imbibe it today. The global tea market, which was valued at around 50 billion U.S. dollars in 2020 and continues to grow annually, is perfectly positioned for innovation.

The overarching mission of the Air Tea Company is to combine the most advanced vaporization technology with the awesome power of herbalism to unlock the amazing gifts of the plant kingdom. Herbalism is the study or use of medicinal properties in plants. Air tea seeks to create an experience where herbalism and technology blend together seamlessly to create a new kind of mindfulness platform. To date most popular mindfulness platforms are solely content based and have yet to be provide the consumer a true mindfulness product. 

Vaporizing herbs releases different phytochemicals than infusing them in water, and the phytochemicals are more immediately bioavailable this way, particularly the phytochemicals that act to calm the nervous system. Thus, Air TeaCups™ will provide for a quicker relaxation experience. 

The Air Tea system is neater, faster and simpler: it doesn’t require any knowledge of herbs, formulating, or extraction to provide consumers with a profound experience.
name: Air Tea Company

description:
WE ARE ON A MISSION TO STIR UP THE GLOBAL TEA & COFFEE MARKET - TAKING SUSTAINABILITY  & VERSATILITY TO THE NEXT LEVEL AND ARE THE LEADING MANUFACTURER OF T-STICKS & COFFEE ROASTER PACKING OUR AMAZING COFFEES INTO COMPOSATBLE CAPSULES AND PODS . NO MESS, NO DRIPS, NO SPOON 

As an entrepreneurial F&B FMCG business founded in 2007, we developed our first brands we manufacture of infusion sticks ourselves several years later to initially solve a messy problem and allow retailers, businesses and consumers to save time and costs within high footfall HORECA environments. Creating a better experience especially within offices, events and conference centres, travel sector; airliners, cruise liners and trains. Our message is simple: ‘make life easier and better’.

What are infusion sticks? A ready-to-brew recycled foil vessel filled with finely selected ingredients like herbals & leaf tea from around the world. 

Infusion sticks solve a genuine problem and our tagline sums it up simply: 
• No mess 
• No drips 
• No spoon 
Our clients love this concept as over time they see the savings not only on time and money, but the benefit to the environment as we move away from plastics and foil to biodegradeable materials that are environmentally sound and sustainable. The range of coffee pods and stick infusions results in fewer cleaning cycles, therefore less water used and reduced wastage of apparent disappearance of tea spoons!
Making a cup of tea and coffee has never been so easy. Now for 2020 with our NEW commercial and home compostable Nespresso compatible pods this will be the future. We source and roast our own coffee and also produce formats for Dolce Gusto compatible own brand and private label for large retailers and brands. 
Our main markets are Europe, China (Asia) and USA. Interested in our brands and the private label product range we can offer, get in touch, we can help.
Read about us in the Times:
http://bit.ly/37MHYsg
The Sunday Times
http://bit.ly/307lq2T

description:

Sustainability is a major focus of our business. We recently became the first (and only) tea company to offer our whole selection of teas in 100% backyard compostable packaging.  We've also carbon-offset the entire supply chain of our products, from origin to the customer, making Arbor Teas the greenest option for Earth-conscious tea drinkers. In recognition of these (and many other) environmental initiatives, we are one of few tea companies recommended by Green America.

description:
O conceito do California Coffee® nasceu quando visitamos o Brasil. Uma questão nos surpreendeu. Porque o maior exportador de café do mundo, que produz um café tão fino e de alta qualidade, não tem a oportunidade de saborear o melhor do que produz? A resposta é muito simples: A maioria da produção dos melhores e mais finos cafés é vendida para a exportação. Os fundadores do California Coffee® decidiram, então, trazer a idéia de "Specialty Coffee House" para o Brasil. 

California Coffee® oferece apenas a melhor classe de café arábica, cultivado em regiões especialmente selecionadas. Lá o café é plantado em grandes altitudes, o que leva a um crescimento mais lento e a um sabor mais fino. O nosso café é selecionado a partir dos melhores grãos de exportação.

California Coffee® se destaca por ser intransigente quanto a qualidade, o frescor e o serviço personalizado e reconhecido. Nossa meta é garantir o melhor copo de café possível, sem levar em consideração o custo ou o esforço exigido. Torrado o nosso café artesanalmente de acordo com os mais rígidos padrões europeus em nossa própria torrefação. Trabalhando continuamente para melhorar a qualidade e a consistência do café para trazer o melhor de cada grão para você.

Finalmente, o maior produtor mundial já pode beber o mesmo café servido nos mais finos Coffee Shops do mundo.

California Coffee®, no Brasil desde 2002.
name: California Coffee

description:
Better communities through better coffee. Redlands, CA. Established in 2008.

Since 2008, Wild Goose Coffee Roasters has made a commitment to sourcing incredible coffees while generously giving back to local communities. With every 1 pound of coffee sold, Wild Goose donates 10 pounds of food to a local food bank.

To date, coffee drinkers like you have helped donate over 3 million pounds of food to a wide network of food banks in the very neighborhoods where our coffee is enjoyed.

Coffee roaster and cafe in Redlands, CA: 2351 W. Lugonia Ave. Ste. J Redlands, CA 92374

description:
Our Mission

Black Fox Coffee is a specialty coffee company born out of a single desire, a better café experience. Founders Daniel Murphy and Gary Hardwick, dissatisfied with their daily coffee options, set out to create full-service cafes, espresso bars and a roastery that honors the Black Fox Coffee mission: to make remarkably good coffee experiences accessible to all.

One of the few multi-roasters in New York City, we source and curate a global coffee offering from the world’s leading roasters and honor it with our craft. We rely on this wide network of industry relationships to guide our purchasing practices and ensure they are aligned with the evolving values and needs of the producers, whom we continue to learn and adapt.

Black Fox endeavors to attract the best coffee minds in the world and promises to continue sharing our passion of coffee and hospitality with each and every cup.
name: Black Fox Coffee

description:
restaurants in Jeddah, providing an extensive food menu, and coffee.

Coffee has been an integral part of the human diet for centuries and has its origins in East Africa and the Arabian peninsula. Actually the English word 'coffee'​ comes from the Arabic word for coffee, pronounced 'qahwe'​. Our passion for coffee was the motivation for the establishment of Caffe Aroma. The concept for Caffe Aroma was born out of the necessity for an Italian style coffee house in a city dominated by Lebanese style cafes. Thus Caffe Aroma was established in the year 1996 with a simple mission; to provide good coffee within a beautiful setting, and unrivalled service for customer satisfaction which is second-to-none.

Here at Caffe Aroma, we serve only the best quality food and coffee because we believe that our clientele deserve nothing less. The ambience, along with our delectable food provide a nearly utopian experience. Initially we specialized in quality coffee, sandwiches and roasted coffee beans, but in the year 1999, we expanded our operations to include a world-class restaurant to meet our loyal customers'​ demands. By offering a mouthwatering array of dishes, we evolved from a humble cafe into a five-star restaurant which caters to all. Our service and decor provide a unique environment for all our customers whether dining or enjoying a cup of coffee while puffing on one of our many flavored shishas. Caffe Aroma is a perfect stop for friends to gather and enjoy themselves, as well as a great place for families to enjoy quality time together while enjoying great food. Caffe Aroma reflects the cosmopolitan nature of the city of Jeddah in that we provide culturally diverse cuisine, bringing to you the most beloved dishes from around the globe.
name: Caffe Aroma

description:
Joe Coffee Company was founded in 2003 as a single specialty coffee shop in Manhattan's West Village. Our vision was to brew the highest quality coffees and serve them with unsurpassed hospitality. Today we have over 20 locations, roast our own coffee at our own Long Island City roastery, and are proud to have a wide range of licensing and wholesale relationships. 

Over the years, a set of cultural values have emerged that define who we are and dictate how we operate:

CURIOSITY: We are eager learners. Whether it's our customers, our coffee, or our coworkers, we keenly explore and engage with the world. 

CRAFT: We obsess over every detail and put intention behind everything we do. We place the highest value on training and education. 

COMMITMENT: We wake up early, hustle hard, rinse and repeat. It's not easy, but the passion shows in every we cup we serve. 

COMMUNITY: We embrace the diverse and vibrant nature of our communities. We encourage and invest in the neighborhoods in and around each Joe cafe.
name: Joe Coffee Company

description:
Our journey began in 2008 when we proudly opened Barcey’s Cafe in Bushwick, Brooklyn, and became an instant hit. We were one of the neighborhood’s trailblazing coffee shops, quickly evolving into an all-day – everyday brunch hotspot that everyone loved. 

With success came a lot of challenges and the dreadful and grueling long hours of work, but we endured it for the rewarding experience of sharing the comfort and tranquility perfectly brewed coffee brings. We loved what we did.



Everything changed in 2017 when we were expecting our first child. After a long and successful stint of operating our business, we decided to let it go to focus more on our baby and her special needs. By the end of 2018, we had sold our business, and though it was the toughest decision we have ever made, we have no ounce of regret to date – it was an amazing run. 

As seasoned entrepreneurs, we could not help but wonder what our next venture would be after this entire ordeal; however we were certain that our love for coffee will never part from us. This led to the idea of creating a convergence of artisan coffee roasters to enable cafés, offices, small businesses across the nation to offer and rotate specialty coffees for their customers and employees regularly at wholesale coffee price. Roasters also get the opportunity to showcase their creations, reach more potential customers and with that premise, cafés and businesses can look forward to excited clients and employees, ready to down their next cup of joy.

Above all, everyone who is part of the process gets to enjoy the abundance and fulfillment of our overall team effort as we provide a platform where we can all share our constant love for coffee. It was on that notion that Barcey’s was conceived and we have not looked back ever since.

To share our love for coffee with the nation and the world at large by connecting businesses to artisan coffee roasters.
name: Powered By Barcey's

description: Fonte Coffee Roaster is one of the original Seattle coffee roasters located in Seattle, Washington, United States. A pioneer of the third wave coffee scene operating both Fonte Coffee bars and Uptown Espresso bars throughout the seattle area.
name: Fonte Coffee Roaster

description:
About Aldo's Coffee Company

Since 1987, Aldo Maiorana has been the heart and soul behind Aldo's Coffee Company, a beloved old-world-style cafe nestled in Greenport, New York. With a passion for coffee roasting and a talent for crafting exceptional biscotti and scones, Aldo's Cafe has been a cherished local gem.

Today, Aldo's Coffee has expanded its reach beyond Greenport to become a beloved presence across the North Fork, the Hamptons, and beyond. Our hand-roasted coffee beans find their way into the cups of discerning patrons in local restaurants and shops.

Wholesale Partnership: We're proud to be the trusted coffee supplier for restaurants, cafes, and businesses across the region. Our commitment to quality and consistency has made us the preferred choice for those who appreciate the art of a perfect cup of coffee. If you're interested in offering Aldo's Coffee to your customers, we welcome you to explore our wholesale opportunities.

As the new owners, our mission is to preserve the time-honored traditions that have made Aldo's Coffee Company a beloved institution while steering it toward new horizons. We understand the importance of gradual change, ensuring that our loyal customers continue to enjoy the coffee and treats they've come to love.

We invite you to explore our website to discover our coffee offerings and other delights. But most importantly, we extend an open invitation to visit our cafe in person, where you can experience the warmth, aroma, and flavor that make Aldo's Coffee Company an integral part of the community.

Join us on this journey as we blend the old with the new, always with a cup of Aldo's exceptional coffee in hand.
name: Aldo's Coffee Company

description:
Cafe Campesino is a  Georgia-based coffee company that sources exclusively fair trade, organic coffees from small-scale farmers around the world. 

Founded nearly 20 years ago, Cafe Campesino started as a coffee importer, but today it operates as a coffee roaster, supplying freshly roasted fair trade, organic coffees to wholesale customers such as coffee shops, natural foods stores, offices, hospitals, universities, and others. 

Retail customers purchase pounds of Cafe Campesino coffee online or at the company's flagship coffee shop in Americus, Georgia, which also features made-from-scratch lunches prepared by a New England Culinary School graduate. 

In addition to coffee, Cafe Campesino also supplies a host of allied products such as World Centric compostable to-go ware, syrups from Monin and Jim's Organic Syrups, teas from Rishi and Choice Organic Teas and organic smoothie puree bases from Dr. Smoothie. The company offers specialty coffee training, employing an Authorized Specialty Coffee Trainer on-staff.

Founded in 1998, Cafe Campesino purchases all of its coffees directly from farmer-owned cooperatives in countries such as: Bolivia, Colombia, Ethiopia, Guatemala, Honduras, Mexico, Peru, and Indonesia. It is able to source coffees directly from farmers by way of its ownership in a unique green coffee importing group of roasters known as Cooperative Coffees. Cooperative Coffees also helps Cafe Campesino maintain business transparency by making its coffee contracts, certifications and bills of lading accessible via the website: OurCoffeePath.com. 

Cafe Campesino became a B Corp in 2017. Its leadership regularly travels to coffee origin, traveling internationally 2-3 times per year. Learn more about Cafe Campesino at www.cafecampesino.com
name: Cafe Campesino

description:
The Coffee & Tea Exchange is an independently owned and family operated coffee roaster, retailer, and wholesaler based in Chicago. We opened our doors in 1975 with the goal of providing the freshest coffee possible at an affordable price. That goal has never changed. We believe that quality coffee doesn’t need a lot of bells and whistles, it just needs to taste damn good.

Our wholesale and mail order businesses are located at our warehouse and roastery in the Belmont-Cragin neighborhood. We provide cafés, restaurants, and retailers throughout the Chicagoland and Northwest Indiana areas, and even one café in the British Virgin Islands with our signature blends and phenomenal single-origin coffees, loose-leaf teas, café supplies, flavored syrups and sauces, coffee and tea equipment, training and equipment support.

Our retail shop and café are located in the Lakeview East neighborhood. The shop has a very nostalgic feel to it, filled with barrels of coffee beans, jars of teas and spices, candy, and coffee and tea makers and accessories. Our café offers our locally roasted coffees, loose-leaf teas, and pastries.
name: The Coffee & Tea Exchange

description: Sweetwaters Coffee and Tea was founded in 1993 in downtown Ann Arbor, MI. As a certified B Corp, Equator leads with a strong commitment to a sustainable, transparent approach that spans over two decades. Today, Equator operates seven retail cafes in the San Francisco Bay Area and has an expanding national wholesale business.

We’re always looking for motivated people to join us in our retail cafes and at our Marin, California headquarters. We’re especially interested if you love spending as much time as possible drinking coffee, feel more at home in a coffee shop than an office, and have a passion for something greater.
 
Learn more about who we are and how we hire by visiting our Careers page: https://www.equatorcoffees.com/careers/.

Our vision ?

Our mission ?

description:
William and Jennifer have been on an adventure!  They founded Paname Coffee & Tea Importers in 2018 when they decided to blend their love of travel with coffee. While living in Europe, William truly enjoyed the art of espresso and Jennifer studied in Rome where she developed an appreciation for art, beauty, coffee, cafes, and truly enjoying sipping a cappuccino. In 2018, they opened their online shop and wholesale, so Cafés Richard coffee and Comptoirs Richard could be enjoyed in homes, restaurants, cafes, and hotels in the United States.

Cafés Richard is a traditional French coffee roaster from Paris, France. Evolving from the Maison Richard founded in 1892, it has remained a family business for four generations. So deeply linked to French gastronomy, French "Art de Vivre" and to Paris.

Paname Coffee & Tea is a local, family-owned business who has partnered with a Parisian family-owned business. They enjoy the innovation and environmental responsibility of Cafés Richard. Cafés Richard offers a variety of products including organic tea, organic coffee, Fairtrade coffee, and 100% biodegradable capsules. Cafés Richard also has classic blends that satisfy the palate.

Outside of their business, Jennifer and William enjoy hiking, traveling, and kayaking with his daughter and chocolate lab.
name: Paname Coffee & Tea Importers

description:
Loop Café is a family affair and business brought to life in 2021, a labor of love and experience – nearly twenty years combined in the hospitality space – with a fierce passion for coffee, wine and everything in between.

Co-founders Pedro Viggiano and Francini de Moraes have always enjoyed hosting and entertaining friends over the years, sharing stories and joy over a glass, or two, of good wine.

With a background in hospitality that began in 2004, Pedro’s career began and grew in the heart of New York City, a mecca and trendsetting scene for hospitality and entertainment. His entrepreneurial pursuits led him to launch a NY-based concept internationally in his home country of Brazil of Sao Paulo for three years, before returning stateside and joining the management team of one of Miami’s premier fine dining restaurants.

With a degree and background in tourism, Francini’s unique international experience includes endeavors in the gastronomy space, including one of the largest cafés in Dublin, Ireland in 2006. Following her arrival in the states, she continued building her experience in hospitality and various cuisines, most notably including French with renowned Chef Alain Ducasse.

After relocating their young family from Miami to Orlando in 2019, both Pedro and Francini recognized the opportunity to launch a business in the area. The idea first came about as not just another café or wine bar, but a cozy getaway that offered a place for people to relax, work and connect with one another. An inviting, family-focused atmosphere where you can grab a coffee on the way to work, and – if you dare – a glass of champagne with a delicious sweet in the late afternoon, or a glass of Pinot Noir at the end of a long, productive day to unwind.

Loop offers a complete experience, with service that starts from a place of love and unparalleled quality when it comes to sating your craving and filling your cup.
name: LOOP CAFE

description:
Welcome to Fiamma! We are a company of espresso machine experts and passionate coffee lovers. 

Founded in 1977, Fiamma has been creating espresso machines with meticulous care and attention to every detail. In our factory, skilled hands and state-of-the-art industrial machinery work together to bring each machine to life. 

We at Fiamma understand that crafting espresso machines requires not only technical expertise but also a deep understanding of the love and care that goes into preparing each perfect cup of espresso.

That's why we work closely with baristas, designers, our valued customers, and partners to shape our range of commercial, small luxury, and home espresso machines.

From our factory in the charming seaside town of Aveiro, Portugal, Fiamma espresso machines travel to a global network of professional Fiamma Partners. From here, they start their journey to coffee roasters, cafés, coffee shops, restaurants and homes where they become the warm heart and soul of the place.

Join us on this journey of ☕ & ❤
name: Fiamma Espresso Machines

In addition to our locations, our product line has also grown from simple whole-bean coffee to more than 24 premium coffees, lattes, specialty beverages, complementaryfoods and merchandise items.
The Second Cup brand has a high degree of retail visibility with locations in high-traffic areas in most Canadian cities and several cities around the world. Our international locations include the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, Kuwait, Bahrain, Egypt, Qatar, UAE, Oman, Jordan, Syria, Cyprus, Turkey, Lebanon, USA, Romania and soon in Morocco.

We source our coffee beans from sustainable farms around the globe, and roast locally in Brooklyn, NYC. We serve some of the best coffee and espresso in the industry at our cafes, and we provide wholesale to other independent cafes and coffee houses, offices, co-working spaces, and anyone else who values super high-quality, organic coffee product.

PROOF’s locations are thoughtfully designed to create a nurturing and inviting environment where New Yorkers can relax, re-center, recharge, and revel in a flawless product.

Apart from our coffee, our product is hospitality – which encompasses the relationships we have with each other, our customers, and our wholesale partners. We are passionate about providing warm, welcoming, and genuine interactions with our customer base and community.

Everything we do is thought out with quality, sustainability, and excellence remaining at the core of our mission.

description:
CC Holdings is a locally owned and operated restaurant group unwilling to compromise its commitment to the delivery of quality service to each customer. CC Holdings, Inc. was founded in Indianapolis in 1992 and has been in continuous operation ever since.

CC Holdings currently owns and operates 13 food and beverage retail units in the greater Indianapolis market. The company is a locally- and woman-owned restaurant group operating Coffee Zon coffee bars, FUZION by Coffee Zon, Nature’s Table Cafes, and Au Bon Pain Cafe.

Typically in nontraditional settings, the company’s locations in Indianapolis include the IU Health Campus; Eli Lilly Campus; Indiana Government Center; and the Indianapolis Airport. One of the company’s more recent locations is at St. Vincent Carmel Hospital, where the company began operations in 1992 with its first Caffe Connection coffee bar.

The firm is a certified DBE/WBE in the City of Indianapolis and the State of Indiana.

CC Holdings understands the unique demands and circumstances of the customer in the non-traditional location. Our concepts and service formats enable us to provide speed of service to the time sensitive guest. Our products are competitively priced. Our menu is varied and continues to attract repeat customers day after day, and sometimes multiple times a day.

description:
Raven's Brew Coffee is a small, family-owned company dedicated to sourcing the world's best coffee in the most irresistible packaging. Each batch of coffee is air-roasted, resulting in a distinct and superior flavor development and notably clean taste. We strive to offer only coffees that will be an enlightening experience for the customer, and fair and just for the small producers of our unique coffees. 

We started roasting in Ketchikan, Alaska in a friend's garage in 1992 and now have roasting facilities in Alaska and Washington. We serve and support coffee retailers nationwide - from small, privately owned shops & cafes to grocery store chains such as Alaska Commercial Company and Whole Foods Market. 

Raven's Brew's proprietary blends are unique in the coffee world, as well as quite distinct from one another. We design these coffees for different occasions, different times of day, even different levels of caffeine content. They are designed, above all, to pander to the personality of the palate. Explore them all!  

Besides coffee quality, one of our great strengths is in our branding. Our main label art was created by the world-famous Alaskan artist Ray Troll. Ray’s designs adorn our coffee packaging as well as T-shirts, mugs, posters and postcards. For wholesale customers, these add to sales and reinforce the clientele to the point of cultishness.
name: Raven's Brew Coffee

description:
Friends Avenue Café, it was founded by young and ambitious three-man team, possibly becoming one of the youngest restaurateurs in the UAE. Having only opened the doors at the end of February, the young trio – Fazliddin Kosimov (24), Davron Hamidov (24) and Ziyovuddin Alikhonov (25) – has already built a loyal clientele of coffee connoisseurs and lovers of good, wholesome food.

From the beginning, with our friendship and young age, we wanted to bring together our energy and passion to create a place where people can socialise, enjoy quality gourmet food and build a strong relationship with a likeminded business. “Friends’ Avenue Café is not a fast food fuel stop, nor is it a fancy, special occasion restaurant. We are a casual, relaxed place, which forms part of your daily or weekly routine. We are aiming to create a warm, comforting space that serves the type of food that you want to have with your friends, family and people close to you.

Having studied, worked and travelled across the world, we were inspired by the chilled-out back streets of New York, while working in various cafés in the city. The atmosphere of Manhattan’s long avenues, where people “can walk, chat, and enjoy their time, feeling stress-free”, helped to inspire the new café’s concept and name a world away in Dubai.
name: Friends' Avenue Cafe

description: Our unique Original Masala chai blend combines premium black tea with pure honey, cinnamon, cardamom, star anise, cloves, peppercorn and ginger root for the ultimate taste sensation. The result is smooth, not-too-spicy, not-too-sweet blend that tastes great morning, noon or night.
name: Prana Chai

description:
In 1999, Jason Scherr opened a small coffee shop on Bedford Avenue in the then sparsely populated neighborhood of Williamsburg, Brooklyn. Well into the aughts, he greeted customers, prepared drinks, wiped down tables, mopped floors, took out the garbage, and did his fair share of bookkeeping (among many other jobs!). He loved the sense of community he was building, but by the mid-2000’s he started to look for a way to grow this sense of community without his personal involvement in each espresso drink. He envisioned a company that would create goodwill with his customers by being the most responsible business it could be, a business that would bring back regulars time and again even if he wasn’t their barista. Think Coffee would become the realization of that vision. 

In 2006, Jason opened the first Think Coffee location on Mercer Street in Greenwich Village with the mission of minimizing environmental impact and sourcing coffee as responsibly as possible. It wasn’t long after the Mercer Street opening that the Think Coffee team started to fulfill its mission by partnering with coffee producers around the globe. 

Today, Think Coffee remains steadfastly independent and locally owned, while working tirelessly to reduce its environmental impact and redress the inequities in the coffee supply chain. It has kept many of the same farmer relationships from its early days, providing long-term stable contracts over the years and returning hundreds of thousands of dollars to the farm working communities that need them the most.
name: Think Coffee

description:
Paradis Denmark is a Danish ice-cream franchise with nearly 50 shops in Denmark.

The first Paradis cafe opened in Nørregade, Århus, Denmark in 2000.
Our vision was to create a Danish version of the ice cream found in Rome. Amongst other things, minimizing fat content and using only natural ingredients became top values. More importantly, freshness was our top-priority, which ultimately meant making ice cream locally every single day.
 
In 2003, our first Copenhagen, Denmark cafe was opened on Sankt Hans Torv in Nørrebro. It proved so successful that within a year we opened another cafe, this time in Frederiksberg, Denmark. With three successful cafes thriving in such a short period of time, it became clear that Denmark loved Paradis. So, in 2005, the first Paradis franchised cafe was opened in Amager, Denmark with subsequent expansion continuing throughout the country which now in 2021 boasts a total of almost 50 cafes in Denmark.
name: Paradis

description:
CAFÉ QUINDÍO S.A.S. nació en 1.992. La empresa está ubicada en la ciudad de Armenia, Quindío, el corazón aromático de Colombia. Aquí se produce el más suave café del mundo, plantado con esmero y dedicación por agricultores y campesinos que habitan zonas montañosas con la altitud ideal para el cultivo del café.

El Quindío produce cerezas recolectadas a mano, beneficiadas y clasificadas con técnicas especiales, pasan a torrefacción a temperatura óptima para resaltar su suavidad, su aroma y su sabor, cualidades que han dado a la marca gran prestigio en los paladares de los conocedores de café.

En nuestra empresa elaboramos otros productos derivados del café para ofrecer diferentes opciones de consumo. Para difundir y capacitar sobre los principios de calidad de la cadena productiva, nuestra empresa cuenta con la ESCUELA DE CAFÉ, de la cereza  a la taza.

Cumplimos con nuestra responsabilidad social empresarial, por medio de alianzas ARTESANÍA Y CAFÉ y el apoyo a ASOCAFÉS, Asociación de Cafés Especiales de Génova, Quindío.

Nuestra empresa está certificada con la norma NTC-ISO 9001:2008, del Sistema de Gestión a la Calidad otorgada por ICONTEC y avalada internacionalmente por IQNet.
name: Café Quindío S.A.S

description:

The cafe is based on the NZ cafe maxim of great food, great coffee and a genuine, well organised, service experience in well run cafes. We source and roast all our own coffee- currently roasting is in Cianjur, Jakarta and Bangsar, Kuala Lumpur and Malaysia. We source coffee from all over the Indonesian archipelago and were pioneers in the Indonesian Specialty cafe movement. 

We are looking at expanding in Asia over the next 2 years- China, Philippines and Japan.

description:
Are you an entrepreneur that has asked yourself… How do I open a coffee cafe? Cuppy’s Coffee, Smoothies & More can give you a step by step guide on how to open a coffee cafe, and become extremely successful in the coffee and espresso business. Americans are turning up at coffee cafes in ever increasing numbers each year. Luckily for you though, most of them would rather enjoy the warmer atmosphere and surroundings of a smaller “mom and pop” type coffee cafe than the cookie cutter style and corporate gleam of a typical coffee shop. If you see yourself handing coffee and espresso drinks as well as delicious baked goods over the counter at your own coffee cafe, then let Cuppy’s Coffee show you how to get there. We’ll help you find a location for your coffee cafe, purchase all of the equipment you’ll need to create the perfect coffee cafe experience for your customers and give you the marketing tools to get customers flowing into your coffee cafe day in and day out.

For more information or to speak with one of our partners about becoming a franchisee, check out our site at cuppyscoffeefranchise.com

But a very important job is done at the beginning of the chain: from farmers in the plantation and in the processing stations, to the importers in selecting only the best crops, to the master roasters that know how to enhance the aromas and flavor of each coffee. description: Amsterdam Roasters is the first co-roasting hub in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. We love to share our coffee roasting facility in the Houthavens in Amsterdam. If you are ready to start roasting your own coffee for home or commercial use, we offer three coffee roasters, storage, packing equipment and support. Without the need for you to invest in expensive machinery and rent. The shared roasting place is for the Netherlands a new business model, but proven to be very successful in San Fransisco and Melbourne for example. It is not only about saving costs, but also about sharing knowledge, green beans and roasting profiles. And, above all, having fun! Send an email to roast@amsterdam-roasters.nl to set up an appointment to see if this great place can work for you!

description:
Genuine Origin is today’s leading on-line supplier of green coffee to roasters in the United States. As division of Volcafe, Genuine Origin is able to leverage one of the world’s largest global suppliers of origin authentic green coffee. 

This vertical integration allows Genuine Origin to not only source coffee from all coffee origins, but it plants the company firmly in those locations with purchasing and processing facilities that work directly with farmers.

The Genuine Origin on-line platform is a modern e-commerce based supply chain built to meet the ever-growing demands of our coffee clients. With a goal of “Making buying green coffee simple”, Genuine Origin is the perfect solution for new and growing roasters to allow them to focus on their business success rather than the complexities of commodity purchasing and logistics
name: Genuine Origin

description:
We are a women-led Arabica coffee producing company from Son La, the northwestern highlands of Vietnam. Our company is dedicated to producing high-quality coffee beans while promoting sustainable practices and gender equality in our workforce.

Our commitment to carbon reduction and sustainable coffee farming is at the forefront of our operations. We use agroforestry intercropping Arabica coffee, macadamia, avocado, and lumber trees in Son La, Vietnam as a method of not only increasing yields but also creating biodiversity and reducing carbon footprint. Our company is constantly researching and co-introducing with international organizations, climate resilient F1-hybrid coffee varieties to ensure the future of coffee production.

We pride ourselves in being a female-led company, and we are committed to fostering a work environment that promotes gender equality. Our team is made up of a diverse group of individuals, each bringing their unique skills and perspectives to our company.

As a company, we are committed to making a positive impact on the coffee industry, and we look forward to working with other organizations to promote sustainable practices and gender equality in the workforce.
name: Detech Coffee JSC

McQuitty & LeMasters Spanish Wines Importer acts as the main sales, marketing, public relations entity for our small partners. The two american families met while living many years in Europe. Our passion for the world of wine and has lit this new phase in a journey as importer, exporter, and distributor.

We are women owned wine import company with two offices. One centralized office in Alexandria Virginia where we manage all of the import, wholesale and distribution in the United States. An Operation office in Madrid Spain, that manages all the exporting, researching and centralizes all the comunicación with the small wineries. This allows us to maintain direct contact between our artisan wineries and our final customers in the United States.

Welcome to our family!

description:
Pure Ground Ingredients is an importer of organic herbs, spices, botanicals + chilies. We purchase organic ingredients raw, process in-house in our facility in Northern Nevada and sell to food +  beverage manufactures across the United State and Europe. We strive to provide the best in organic ingredients all while empowering farmers and communities around the world. 

At PGI, we like to think of ourselves as the bridge between farmers of organic ingredients and manufacturers of organic products- and our most important role is being a friend to both. It didn’t take us long to learn that farmers thrive when our customers thrive, and vice versa- so we work every day to play a role that adds value to both parties. We source ingredients from over 35 different countries and are on a continuous mission to both improve product quality and ensure economic vitality for our farmers and their communities as well as for our customers. We replenish land, invest in communities, develop education programs, and do everything we can to support sustainable practices, a healthy plant and happy people.
name: Pure Ground Ingredients

description:
Sustainability isn’t just about tackling climate change, it represents a growing conscience around our actions and the impact they have on people, animals and planet. The personal, professional and governmental move to sustainable practice is driven by a desire to change our impact on the world, but we can’t do this without knowing the certainty of our actions. 

 

Transparency is one way of holding ourselves accountable, but for it to be effective it must be underpinned by proven traceability. 

 

Our scientific traceability does just that. Working with Mother Nature, we help brands across fashion, food and pharmaceutical industries verify the origin and authenticity of their products and raw materials. With this verified truth, brands are empowered to make changes across their supply chain to operate more sustainably, and pass those assurances onto their consumers.
name: Oritain

description: Nam Coffee is the first Vietnamese craft coffee importer and roaster based in Los Angeles. Born in the highland city of Pleiku, founder and Vietnamese immigrant Vince Nguyen sources beans directly from coffee farms like those prevalent in his hometown. Newly launched in 2022, Nam Coffee is Nguyen’s love letter to all the places he’s lived — the Central Highlands, Saigon, and California — and the coffee culture he grew up with from a young age. Nguyen first found his love for coffee at age 12, when he began working at his mother's street side coffee cart in Saigon. Now, he's created a brand that spotlights the traditional as well as the modern tastes of Vietnamese coffee.

description:
Easyfairs organisiert und veranstaltet Events, die Communities unter dem Motto „Visit the future“ zusammenbringen.

Wir organisieren derzeit 200 Events in 14 Ländern (Algerien, Belgien, Dänemark, Finnland, Frank-reich, Deutschland, Italien, Niederlande, Norwegen, Portugal, Spanien, Schweden, Schweiz und Großbritannien) und betreiben 8 eigene Messegelände in Belgien, den Niederlanden und Schweden (Antwerpen, Gent, Mechelen-Brüssel Nord, Namur, Gorinchem, Hardenberg, Malmö und Stockholm).

In der D-A-CH-Region organisiert Easyfairs u.a. die all about automation, die automation & electronics, AQUA Suisse, die EMPACK, die FMB, die LOGISTICS & AUTOMATION, die LOGISTICS & DISTRIBUTION, die maintenance, die PUMPS & VALVES, die RECYCLING-TECHNIK und die SOLIDS.

Unser Ziel ist es, das Geschäftsleben unserer Kunden zu vereinfachen und den Return on Investment für professionelle Communities durch unsere All-in-Formate, fortschrittliche Technologien und einen kundenzentrierten Ansatz zu erhöhen.

Unsere digitalen Formate und Initiativen bieten unseren Communities hervorragende Möglichkeiten, sich effektiv zu vernetzen und das ganze Jahr über Geschäfte zu machen. Wir hören auf unsere Communities, um überzeugende Online-Formate zu schaffen, die zu ihren sich ständig weiterentwickelnden Bedürfnissen passen.

Die Easyfairs Gruppe beschäftigt 600 hochengagierte Talente, setzt die besten Marketing- und Technologie-Tools ein und entwickelt Marken mit einer starken Anziehungskraft für unsere Stakeholder.

Im Jahr 2018 wurde Easyfairs zum belgischen "Entrepreneur of the Year®" ernannt und erhielt die Auszeichnung als "Best Managed Company" und "Great Place to Work" von Deloitte. Im Jahr 2021 verlieh Deloitte Easyfairs zum dritten Mal in Folge den Status "Best Managed Company".

In der Liste der weltweit führenden Messegesellschaften liegt das Unternehmen auf Platz 17.

„Visit the future“ gemeinsam mit Easyfairs und erfahren Sie mehr auf www.easyfairs.com

description:
We are event professionals that have owned and operated event companies which produced corporate events all over the globe. When sourcing for the best products and services for a particular event, it would often take days and multiple requests for suppliers to eventually provide the specs on the items they owned – prices, quantity, colors, sizes, materials, pictures, as well as their multiday rates, minimum order, delivery fee and more. We would then spend days reviewing and consolidating all the information from various sources - word, excel, PowerPoint, pdfs, emails, and websites – to choose the ideal items we would include within the presentation for our client. At Event Options, we eliminate those inefficiencies for the entire event ecosystem.

•	1000’s of event rental items in each market we service.

We wanted a simple name that would voice our commitments and give us purpose, now and in our future.

By using “love for life” as our guiding principle, we conduct our business with a strong ethical foundation and a sense of fairness. When we combine this guiding principle along with our devotion to producing only the freshest, highest quality coffee products, we feel everyone wins and we are unmatched in the industry.

description:
Since 1996, German American Events, LLC, a subsidiary of the German American Chamber of Commerce of the Midwest, has hosted the Christkindlmarket Chicago as a free event, featuring international and local vendors with unique offerings for all ages. The German-style outdoor market has become so popular that it expanded to other locations in Illinois and Wisconsin. The unique shopping experience, diverse holiday entertainment and original food and beverages like the imported mulled wine, called Glühwein, make the Christkindlmarket a preferred and popular destination. Admission is always FREE!

Christkindlmarket unites cherished German and European tradition with international flair and local charm. Inspired by the 16th century Christkindlesmarkt in Nuremberg, Germany, one of the first outdoor markets of its kind, the Christkindlmarket is well-known for its vendors’ high quality gifts and food, holiday cheer, and for being the ideal place for families to make unique memories.
name: The Christkindlmarket

description:
Firsd Tea is the U.S. subsidiary of parent company, Zhejiang Tea Group, Ltd., China’s largest tea exporter and the world leader in green tea exports. Founded in 1950, the company has been the largest tea producer and exporter in China for 25 consecutive years. The company has remained one of the leading and most technologically advanced manufacturers and innovators in the Chinese tea industry. The company boasts strategic collaboration with the Science Department of Zhejiang University as well as the Hangzhou Tea Research Institute of All China Federation of Supply and Marketing Co-operatives. Zhejiang Tea Group’s portfolio of products include EU complied conventional teas and organic teas (first organic tea promoter in China since 1989), decaf teas (one of the only two companies in China who have a CO2 decaf facility) and chemical solvent free tea extractions (instant teas, tea polyphenols and EGCG etc.).

With over 65 years’ experience as a leader in the tea industry, the company exports more than 40,000 tons of tea annually including: green tea, black tea, white tea, oolong tea, pu-erh tea, scented tea, special gourmet tea and intensive processed tea products. Zhejiang Tea Group is also the first company to resurrect the technologies of sencha and matcha production- these prized teas actually originated in China during the Song dynasty. By inheriting the tradition of China’s 4,000 year old tea culture, our group has integrated traditional tea processing crafts with modern technique, developing innovative tea products to meet the needs of modern society. We create value by ensuring our product quality is true to authentic Chinese tradition while guaranteeing the best prices for our customers – integrity is our highest value.
name: Firsd Tea

description:
We are an independent tea house based in the South-West, founded with a goal to create healthy, honest and flavourful teas and infusions. 
All blends are Ethically Sourced with researched provenance and we are proud to say that all our packaging and products are 100% biodegradable. Quality you can see and taste. A modern twist on a traditional product. 

“ I started The Leafy Tea Company in 2016 when I was 16 years old and in the middle of my gcse's! I have always loved fruity infusions but found that many were lacking in flavour and so one wet, cold February half-term break I decided to source my own ingredients. Hand-packing the teas into self-seal paper tea bags, The Leafy Tea Company was born.

Since then I have travelled to Malawi and visited one of the oldest tea estates in the country; I was so impressed with the caring attitude of the plantation owners towards their workers that I now source most of my tea direct from their Estate.
Enjoy! ”
April
name: The Leafy Tea Company

description:
Our Story
 
Welcome to J'enwey Tea Co. parent company of New England Tea Co., one of the worlds most innovative and trend setting purveyors of the finest estate and boutique blended teas. Designing Signature Blends along with our 175+
Tea portfolio - brings our hotels, spas, resorts, restaurants and offices a specialized tea program - staff training - tea cocktails, amenities... We innovate and create to constantly bring  you and your guests a touch of magic and 5 Star service - parallel to none. 
Our Certified Tea Master and her team work directly with Estate growers from all corners of the world, offering the finest quality whole leaf teas, from their hands to ours. It is with humbled pride that we offer first flush teas, aged pu-erhs, delicate whites, rooibos reds, oolongs, and brilliant greens.
 
At J'enwey Tea Company we are privileged to share in life's finest moments with you. Believe in life’s simple beauties. Believe in life’s smallest treasures. Believe in the brilliance of being you!
 
Personal note from our Tea Master to you:
 
"I truly believe tea touches all our lives. In the moments the rain is pouring outside your door step, in the moments you share desserts at your favorite aunts house, with cookies after your first day at a new job, on your drive to search for your new home, chilled during a hot summers afternoon, at the table of a loved one speaking of their cancer, the lazy morning you wake up in a new country, and in the moment you first realize how truly wonderful this day is. Tea starts us off, meets us in the middle, and dances us through to the end. May all your days be filled with health, happiness, love, laughter, and the simplest pleasures life has to offer, like a beautiful cup of tea. Thank you for allowing us to share in your life's wondrous moments."​ 
 
Lisa Marie
name: Jenwey Tea Co.

Bulgarian Tea Company specializes in the production of tea from selected high-quality herbs and fruits.

For more than 20 years we have been producing and processing herbs with love, professionalism and care for our customers. description:
Tea Guys is a full tea solution provider offering both hot and iced tea bags, matcha powder, bulk tea, tea concentrates, and an extremely exciting, first-of-its-kind, sparkling tea. Sparkling teas are just the latest creation from our decades-long pursuit of the finest teas around the world. It’s a natural evolution from our hand-blended tea business that continues to grow organically to an ever-expanding community of tea lovers worldwide. It all begins with our hand-blended tea recipes. The flavor we pack into each tea bag, each sip of sparkling tea, or our own micronized tea powder is vibrant and unique. We make every batch by hand in small lots – not because it’s easier – but because it’s the right way to create the product we want. Our blending facility and store are located in Whately, MA –  a small New England farming community.

How did sparkling tea come about?

The Tea Guys create, taste and refine new blends all the time. When a particular recipe called attention to itself, we’d make a batch, cold-filter it and add effervescence. It took time, but it was worth it, and soon it became the refreshment of the blending room.

These flavors are our favorites. And we’ll continue to bring you new ones. Sparkling tea is always a treat for us–hopefully it will be for you as well. 

Freshness isn’t something you crave occasionally: for those of us who really care about what we consume, freshness is mandatory.
name: Tea Guys

description:
The Boulder Tea Company is a both a wholesale and retail company that specializes in premium loose-leaf teas from China, Japan, India, Sri Lanka, and Taiwan. BTC is the sole supplier of the Boulder Dushanbe Teahouse, on of the largest teahouses in the United States and the only authentic Persian teahouse in the western hemisphere. (learn more about the teahouse here: www.boulderteahouse.com) 
The Boulder Tea Company carefully sources tea from the countries of origin directly following the harvest each year. Each tea is hand selected for quality in the cultivation, harvest,  and processing. The final product is carefully analzyed to ensure quality standards before being added to the annual tea portfolio.
The Boulder Tea Company is open to wholesale accounts. Additionally, BTC creates custom tea programs for fine dining establishments who would like to optimize their premium tea service and selection. Finally, BTC is proud to offer a select line of their teas to the retail market. 
Please contact us for information on any of our services.
name: The Boulder Tea Company

description:
Established in 1985, Red Blossom Tea Company is San Francisco’s premier source for artisanal tea and teaware.

We are direct importers, traveling each year to the tea gardens and studios that produce our range of premium whole leaf teas and traditional teaware. During our sourcing trips, we focus on provenance, varietal, harvest season, and crafting technique as our guide to the best crops.

Founded by the Luong family, we first opened our doors as a neighborhood apothecary serving San Francisco's diverse Chinatown community. Our shop was originally known as Yau Hing (meaning 'to flourish again'), a nod to our community's immigrant background and the opportunity we received for a fresh start in this country. During our time in business, Yau Hing garnered renown for our selection of quality tea and Chinese herbs.

We’ve made a few changes since our early days: we redesigned our tasting room and added English descriptions to our canisters. Our business has grown along the way too, and today we’ve partnered with the nation’s most respected restaurants to introduce the artisanal tea experience to fine dining. One thing hasn't changed: our dedication to quality and staying true to the traditions and standards that have guided Red Blossom Tea Company since its founding.

We have a selection of nearly 100 teas and an extremely knowledgeable and helpful staff to guide your journey into premium tea. We invite you to browse our full collection at redblossomtea.com, and join us on YouTube to hone your tea knowledge.
name: Red Blossom Tea Company

description:
Sugimoto Tea Company (formerly known as Sugimoto America/SA Japanese Green Tea) was founded in Shizuoka, Japan by Zenichi Sugimoto in 1946. The tea Zenichi made was so delicious that he quickly was able to expand operations from just providing his tea to locals, to sharing it even further across the country. Decades later the Sugimoto tradition of producing fine Japanese green teas is being passed down to the third generation of Sugimoto Tea Makers and in 2008 Kyohei Sugimoto made the journey from Japan to the US to bring his family's delicious tea to international tea drinkers. 

Our mission is to help people all around the world achieve a healthier, richer life by providing them with delicious and high quality Japanese green tea.

Today, Sugimoto Tea Company produces a wide range of Japanese green teas including matcha and even has many certified Organic teas available too. Our retail line of teas is available at grocery stores around the US, we supply a wide range of Japanese teas wholesale or as an ingredient to companies throughout the world, and we also help companies manufacture their own private line of teas including matcha.
name: Sugimoto Tea Company

We'll be offering new chai concentrates, specialty tea in kegs, our award winning loose leaf blends, high-end pyramid tea bags and stuff we can't announce yet to our retail and food service partners.

description:
We traveled the world during our college semester abroad and stumbled upon loose tea for the first time. It was in a tiny Czech teahouse in the center of Prague that got us hooked on tea.

We returned to the US and quickly discovered a problem. If we wanted loose tea, we had to go out of our way to a specialty store, pay an absurd price and confront confusing tea names and origins. The tea world was filled with too much jargon and stereotypes of stuffy tea parties. What if we flipped it upside down?

We started Tiesta Tea to revolutionize the way people consume tea.

Finding the right tea should be simple: what will it do for me and what does it taste like. By focusing on function and flavor, we make tea approachable and easy to understand. We created five functional categories based on the health benefits that each blend naturally gives you. 

We also believe that life is about more than just tea and business.

We believe in using our platform to give back directly to people in need in our communities. Billions of people lack access to clean water. To combat that, we set aside a portion of sales from each of our bottled teas to build water wells. We build these wells in communities in Nigeria that grow some of our ingredients. Because we want to support the communities that support us. Millions more do not have a place to sleep at night. Every January, our team and volunteers gather together to pass out hot tea and Warmth Kits to those living on the cold city streets of Chicago. We believe businesses shouldn’t just generate profits, they should do good, too.

It’s really that simple. Do what you love, step out of your comfort zone and be you. Be the best version of yourself that you can be and help others to do the same.

Live Loose,
The Tiesta Tea Team

RECENT AWARDS

+ INC. BEST WORKPLACES 2018
+ INC. RISING STARS - 30 UNDER 30 2018
+ INC. 5000 FASTEST GROWING COMPANY 2017 & 2018
+ CRAINS 20 IN THEIR 20s 2018
name: Tiesta Tea Company

After selecting the finest coffee beans from around the world, Joffrey’s roasts in small batches, flavors, grinds, packages and distributes through its Tampa plant. For more information about Joffrey's Coffee & Tea Co., please visit http://joffreys.com or call (800) 458-JAVA (5282).

We also focus of customer education, taking the time to help each person find a tea that is right for them.

description:
Paromi Tea is a specialty full-leaf tea company. We’re family-owned and known for delivering an exceptional sensory experience – Teas that look, smell, and taste fantastic. 

We start with exquisite, carefully selected ingredients. All of our teas and accompanying ingredients are 100% natural, most are certified organic, and many are also Fair Trade Certified™. 

All of our teas are full-leaf because full-leaf tea has more flavor and health benefits than small tea particles or tea dust. We offer noteworthy single-origin varietals as well as unique, meticulously crafted blends prepared in small batches.

The Paromi Tea pyramid sachet collection is packaged in our signature glass jar and is available at www.paromi.com as well as at specialty retailers throughout the country. You can also enjoy a cup at hotels, resorts, spas, restaurants, boutiques, cafes, and bakeries nationwide. We recently opened several loose tea shops within select Whole Foods Markets and more of these shops are coming soon. Pop in to a shop and explore over 40 loose leaf teas and tea accessories.

We are looking for energetic, entrepreneurial team members interested in joining a fast-paced, high-growth environment. If that’s you, check out our open positions on LinkedIn.
name: Paromi Tea

description: Founded in 1859, The Great Atlantic & Pacific Tea Company (A&P) is one of the nation's first supermarket chains. The company operates more than 300 stores in six states under the following trade names: A&P, Best Cellars, Food Basics, The Food Emporium, Pathmark, Superfresh and Waldbaum's.
name: The Great Atlantic & Pacific Tea Company (A&P)

description:
Founded in 1998 by Kathryn Petty, White Lion Tea offers a collection of rare and beautiful teas from the world’s finest gardens. We provide a wide range of specialty tea products to service the hospitality industry; hotels and resorts, restaurants, spas, and coffee and tea shops. Elegantly packaged gifts, retail items, and amenities support the brand and drive profit. Key distributors include 
Sysco Foods and Avendra-approved Atlanta Foods International and Universal Companies. 

White Lion is a leading expert in operations and implementation of tea service in the hospitality segment. We are known for our impressive and highly styled presentation boxes and service style accessories. We excel in 
customization and small run private label programs that include marketing materials designed to drive profit. We provide training materials to support operations, procedures, and best practices. We can create a “boutique feel” yet execute at a national scale. We are known innovators, offering proprietary products such as Honey Pearls, an all natural crystallized honey.
name: White Lion Tea

description:
Assam Tea Company is a licensed buyer, importer, blender and distributor of teas, herbs, cardamom, hot peppers and other spices from Assam region of India. The company started in year 2000 in Florida, United States, and today has offices and warehousing facilities in United States, Canada and India. 

Assam Tea Company provide tea buyers anywhere in the world the best connection to source pure, fresh and high quality Assam tea, cardamom, ginger, bhut jolokia/gost peppers, and other spices that grows in large quantities in the remote Assam region in the North East of India. 

Dozens of small tea growers of the Assam region are working directly with Assam Tea Company in order to promote their organically farmed, artisanal black, green and puerh teas to international buyers.

Assam Tea Company sources the best quality large black cardamom directly from growers in Sikkim, Arunachal Pradesh and Nagaland. The company sources dry ginger (c/s), black pepper, cassia cinnamon (c/s), and many other spices and herbs directly from growers in remote regions of Meghalaya, Manipur, Tripura and Mizoram. 

The company controls 100% of the supply chain process from sourcing, to transporting to export paperwork.

Assam Tea Company has its own organic tea and spice blending facility in Vancouver, Canada, and buyers and logistics team on the ground in Assam. 

The company caters primarily to high end food service operators in United States and Canada, but also  exports high quality blended teas including Chai, Earl Grey and fruit flavored teas to buyers in East Asia, Australia and Europe.

Whether sourcing from Assam, or sourcing from stock in North America, Assam Tea Company offers the best value for the money to its clients, and a long term partnership in sourcing high quality ethical and ecologically sustainable teas, spices, herbs and tea blends.
name: Assam Tea Company

description:
“Tea is so much more than a beverage to quench thirst; it soothes the soul and nurtures the spirit one sip at a time.” Beth M. Johnston 

Born from a humble cup of tea, Teas Etc opened in 1998 and has grown with the evolution of specialty tea in North America and beyond. A commitment to quality and supply chain transparency spawned the development of a network of farmers and purveyors around the globe allowing us to offer Simply Better Tea™. 

We continue to deliver origin authentic specialty teas of premium quality, many of which are still processed by hand. The development of exceptional, small batch, on-trend, flavors and blends further distinguish our offerings. A range of packaging options; bulk, pre-packaged, branded and private label, helps us create the right program fit for diverse businesses. Quality products, authenticity and value added services are appreciated by clients large and small. 

The company’s commitment to quality is evident in the numerous industry recognitions and awards they have received. In a defining moment, Teas Etc. became the ONLY female owned company to win World Tea Championship in 2008 and 2009. They have continued that success every year thereafter with numerous wins in multiple categories.

We welcome clients to our USDA NOP organic and Kosher certified facility in South Florida, an extension of our “green” philosophies where we make use of eco-friendly and recycled building materials and energy efficiencies to further reduce our environmental impact.
name: Teas Etc, Inc

description:
A Dubai-born tea company offering unique feel-good teas from all around the world delivered right to your doorstep. 

Tea is a vessel for many beautiful things that uplift the human spirit. It is appreciated and cherished more than just a drink. There are so many amazing health benefits of tea such as calming the mind and body, revving up the metabolism, and improving the immune system. These are the greatest determinants of well-being. Simply put, tea just makes us feel good, and we are on a mission to spread awareness of tea rituals to everyone that we touch, and inspire a culture of tea lovers.
name: Feel Good Tea Co.

description:
BELLOCQ Tea Atelier has turned seven years of sourcing and blending the world’s finest teas and botanicals into a devoted and articulate history of tea connoisseurship. Behind the hidden storefront in a quiet corner of Brooklyn, New York, single-estate teas are offered exclusively whole leaf, while signature organic tea and herbal infusions are carefully created by hand. 
Magnificent rows of yellow canisters line the shelves of the atelier and draped hand-painted canvases share space with hanging ferns and moss. A serendipitous find for the earnest wanderer, the business is devoted to the luxury of fine tea and exploration of the senses with an unwavering adherence to excellence.

The founders of the award-winning company met while working at a well-known lifestyle brand,  Heidi Johannsen Stewart on the publishing side as a food editor and photo stylist and Michael Shannon as a product designer. “Before Bellocq we were often traveling around the world, discovering incredible tea and sharing it with each other," Michael explains. This delightful habit became ritual and, along with a passionate appreciation of traditional artisan work, ignited the idea for a business.
Bellocq’s carefully selected, single-origin offerings originate from the finest estates around the world and are exclusively full leaf, often organic, and sourced from high elevation gardens. “Our selections are the result of rigorous sourcing, cultivated relationships and lengthy tastings,” says co-founder Heidi. “The unifying factor is exceptional quality and a beautiful flavor profile.”  

Asserting the notion that the finest teas can be an everyday luxury, Bellocq’s unique methodology is redefining the luxury tea business to suit the evolving and sophisticated spirit of the modern client. Bellocq Teas are now found in the finest shops, restaurants, spas and hotels around the world.
name: Bellocq Tea
