description:
ProbatUSA is the North American subsidiary of PROBAT AG. Our mission is to provide FUTURE-PROOF SOLUTIONS FOR YOUR COFFEE.
~
Since 1868 PROBAT has stood for pioneering solutions in the processing of coffee. We have become the world market leader in machinery and systems for the coffee and food industry. We employ over 900 people around the world at sites in the USA, Brazil, Italy, Scotland, India and Canada. We also share a passion for coffee and a fascination for technology with representatives in over 40 countries. Each one of these is an important brand ambassador for PROBAT.

Our Mission 
Probat’s mission is to provide ~ Future-proof solutions for your coffee  ~ and this is the driving force behind our daily and passionate dedication to our work.

Our Core Benefits
CONSISTENTLY HIGH COFFEE QUALITY 
With PROBAT, our customers always achieve the best possible coffee quality. Our machines and equipment help them to get the best out of the bean ― consistently for decades. We ensure that they are well equipped for the future.

BEST LIFE-CYCLE COSTS AND PERFORMANCE 
Those who process coffee with PROBAT have highly efficient workflows. With our solutions our customers will realize cost savings throughout the entire life-cycle of the machines and equipment. This provides long-lasting peace of mind.

INDIVIDUAL AND PIONEERING SOLUTIONS 
PROBAT delivers individual machines, processes, and services that move our customers forward. We support them with inspiring solutions so that they can reach their goals. This generates enthusiasm.

For more information about our complete coffee processing systems, call 847.415.5293, email marketing-pbi@probat.com, or visit probatusa.com.
name: Probat, Inc. | North America

description:
Welcome to Drop Coffee Roasters! We are a specility coffee roastery based in Stockholm, Sweden. It is a family business owned by Joanna Alm and Stephen Leighton. 

We at Drop Coffee are dedicated to really tasty and sustainably produced coffee, we visit all producers we buy coffee from. We are roasting the coffee carefully with a complete focus on the sweetness and vibrancy of each unique coffee, always striving for clarity in the coffee, without ashy roast flavours.
We are shipping coffee straight from our roastery every day, worldwide!

Drop Coffee was founded in Stockholm, Sweden in 2009 as a coffee bar by Mariatorget, focusing on serving tasty coffee. We started roasting our own coffee in the back of the shop in 2010, on a one-kilo roaster. We started roasting for wholesale customers in 2012, when we moved into a proper roastery with a 25-kilo roaster. Recently we moved our roastery to Rosersberg, north of Stockholm. From June 2018 our roastery is certified organic.

Kalita has been supplying us with our favorite brewing supplies since 2013, when Drop Coffee became the Kalita supplier of Sweden. 

Joanna Alm, managing director of Drop Coffee, is a three times Swedish Coffee Roasting Champion who has placed second in the world, and she is also the author of the book Manifest För Bättre Kaffe.

Store: At our café, Drop Coffee at Mariatorget (Wollmar Yxkullsgatan 10) or at our wholesale partners around the world

Wholesale orders
Email us at info@dropcoffee.se for wholesale inquiries and prices. We are roasting all coffee orders on demand.
name: Drop Coffee

description:
Giava Coffee Company provides high-quality, full service distribution of premium coffee and coffee-related supplies and services to the "Out-of-Home" and "At-Home" coffee market.

Giava is responsible for importing, distributing and marketing Buondi® products in the US. Launched by Montarroio Coffee Co. in 1986 and acquired by Nestlè SA in 1992, Buondi® caffè roasted beans and ground coffee is available in a variety of intensities and formats to satisfy a range of palates. BUONDI® has been available in Europe and select markets across the globe for about 30 years. Since Nestlè SA bought BUONDI®, it has become the flagship brand for the professional, or Away-from-Home, coffee market.

The company works closely with each customer to recommend the right product mix unique for their retail base, appropriate stocking levels, pricing and display recommendations, as well as promotional ideas and material to increase sales. We are not only selling products, we are selling service: providing coffee education, as well as brewing and preparation training to our customers.

Giava is currently pursuing expansion opportunities in other regions and is looking to establish new relationships with distributors and food service partners. Interested? Let's talk! hello@giavacoffee.com
name: Giava Coffee Company

description:

We care deeply about the entire process from farm to cup only working with specialty grade coffee. We care about the story that the coffee is bringing to the table as much as the excellent taste that it provides. 

Excellent customer service is a priority in our business. There are many cafe's, roasters, and green coffee distributors but they are not us. Here at Baba Java, we want to partner with businesses needing green coffee but also grow a relationship with them. We know that a partnership built on trust with our clients is made to last.

Excellent education is imperative for our business to continue moving forward and partnering alongside others to do the same. Education is what helps us grow in our coffee knowledge and share this with our clients all the same. This promotes a connection between client, distributor, and farmer where we are all able to showcase the coffee that brings us all together. 

Contact us and visit us so that we can chat over a delicious cup of excellent coffee. 

Website coming soon.

Roasting in the morning and delivering in the afternoon – she found that there was increasing demand from consumers for quality coffee, at an affordable-luxury price and growth ensued.

Fast forward to 2022… the building is a little bigger (20X+ the size) and more employees were added including: her husband (Doug), her son (Doug JR.), her second son (Conrad) and her daughter-in-law (Amanda).

description:
Karst Organics sources organically grown, single origin green coffee beans directly from East Timor (Timor-Leste), to be exported to the UK and Europe. Established in 2017, our aim is to provide coffee roasters with a specialty product whilst also committing to pay a truly fair price to our partner farmers in order to facilitate a more sustainable and consistent model of income. 

Having listened to our partner farmers, we identified focussed areas for support in processing, storage facilities and improved water supply. In late 2018, construction began on a centralised processing facility allowing for greater control of consistency and quality. Following which, a warehouse was built to facilitate better parchment storage. Finally, in March 2019, new piping was laid to provide improved water supply, not only to the centralised processing facility but also to a number of domestic households. 

A major factor contributing towards the increase in the quality of our coffee is through the development of targeted training sessions. These allow farmers to come together and learn from knowledgeable coffee advisors and also from each other. By encouraging better communication between farmers, this will benefit the local industry as a whole, as greater transparency and awareness of the specialty sector will encourage the farmers to implement more controlled processing methods thereby resulting in wider opportunities within more international markets. 

Karst Organics is unique as we are at origin and hands-on throughout the whole process; from the moment the cherries are picked to the moment when the green beans are packed and sealed ready for export to the UK. With full transparency and traceability, buyers can have the confidence in truly knowing where our green beans come from and who has been involved during each step of the process. 

We are proud to have established partnerships with our farmers which will in the long-term provide a more sustainable and consistent inco
name: Karst Organics

description:
In 2012, Death Wish Coffee Co. was created in a small coffee shop in Saratoga Springs, New York. Coffee shop owner and DWC founder, Mike Brown, saw a need for coffee that was both strong and delicious to serve his groggy morning customers. After creating the perfect blend of beans and combining it with his unique roasting technique, Death Wish Coffee was born. Today, thousands of people trust Death Wish Coffee to wake them up and keep them going every day.

Death Wish Coffee is a breakthrough in the coffee world. Made with a combination of Arabica and Robusta beans sourced from all over the world, in addition to a unique, slow roasting process, Death Wish Coffee has a strong, smooth, bold taste — and it's twice as strong as your average cup of coffee. All of our coffee beans are certified USDA organic and Fair Trade, ensuring that you have the highest quality cup of coffee out there.

In 2015, we won Intuit’s ‘Small Business Big Game’ competition, which gave us a 30-second commercial spot during the Super Bowl. Since then, our business has grown every day, allowing us to reach more coffee drinkers than ever before. We also continue to release limited edition merchandise such as apparel and mugs to make sure the Death Wish brand fits into every aspect of our community's lives. And now, Death Wish Coffee is on thousands of store shelves — and we're adding more every day.

Through our rapid growth, our mission remains the same: To fuel you wherever you go.
name: Death Wish Coffee Company

description:
Independence Coffee Co.'s mission is to create a passionate community of coffee and tea enthusiasts by providing the highest quality hand-roasted and packaged 'world'​ coffees and hand-blended tea products (on time) to our customers while honoring traditional 'old school'​ roasting and blending methods that pay respect to coffee's rich history...while of course, having a blast doing it.

On October 14th, 2003 we pulled our first batch of coffee from our 10# roaster in a small building on our homestead. I still have the original one pound bag of Colombian Supremo from that day. 

The first year we roasted and experimented with 2,000 pounds of coffee. That year we were able to refine our basic skills and develop our 'Independent'​ style of deep-roasting which pays respect to old-school roasting methods and traditions.

We joke about giving away 1,800 pounds of experimental coffees to family, friends, and anyone who would try our coffees and we drank the rest. (It's actually the truth!)

Independence has been truly fortunate and blessed in the area of growth. In 2020 we will roast over 800,000 pounds of high grown Arabica coffees from thirteen different producing countries and growing regions for our customers who range from individuals ordering from our website to large grocery markets such as H-E-B, Buy Fir Less, Albertsons and Whole Foods Market.

We've had the opportunity to service international corporations such as ConocoPhillips who have trusted Independence with providing their customers and corporate gift clients with exceptional hand-roasted and blended products. 

You'll still see Christi and I 'hand-delivering'​ our coffees and teas to grocery markets, convenience stores, offices and other family-owned establishments. It's just what we do. If you see us stocking shelves, feel free to say hello! 

"Savor Your Independence and Grind True!"
name: Independence Coffee Company

description:

We retail and wholesale our hand blend and custom craft of the world’s finest organic teas and coffees. 


Ateaz started with the vision to provide the freshest and finest quality of Organic Teas and Coffees. Therefore, our Teas are blended upon receiving your order and are carefully selected directly from growers, each one offering a unique story. Our Coffees are fresh roasted to provide our customers a rich experience in taste and quality. 

At Ateaz we continually experiment with new blends, roasting profiles, and search potential coffee varieties to expand our offerings. We strive for perfection with every hand-crafted roast and only offer top grade, fresh roasted, gourmet coffee. At Ateaz our priority is to provide you with the best quality Organic Teas and Coffee with unique favor profiles that allows an exclusive experience with every cup. 866.584.3336

description:
At Red Diamond, perfection is our craft, real coffee and tea – our creed. It drives everything we do. Our family has painstakingly sourced and crafted the finest blends of coffee and tea for five generations. From one generation to the next, from field to final sip, we take the extra care you deserve. No shortcuts. No compromises. Just real, fresh, coffee and tea. Guaranteed.
 
Since 1906 we’ve been driven by an obsession to provide a world-class coffee and tea experience and the cornerstone of our company has always been our commitment to unparalleled quality:
•	Our coffee line offers the finest blends of gourmet beans available. Combined with state-of-the-art Scolari roasting, our unique blends from all over the world allow us to produce the perfect cup of coffee every time.
•	Our tea line features a collection of exceptional hand picked, estate-grown teas from the finest tea plantations around the world.
 
A cup of Red Diamond can be enjoyed in fine restaurants, hotels, offices, hospitals, and homes across the country.
 
For more information, visit us at reddiamondbevservice.com, reddiamond.com, and perfectsnoteasy.com; and make sure to follow us on twitter (@reddiamond), like us on Facebook (@reddiamond), and follow us on Instagram (@drinkreddiamond).
name: Red Diamond Coffee & Tea

description:
Our story began in 1983 when we first experienced the wonder of the café culture in Vienna, Austria. It was there that we noticed coffee’s remarkable ability to inspire and energize people. We wanted to create the same stimulating environment when we returned to Iowa…we wanted to explore how a perfectly brewed cup could bring people together for meaningful conversation. When we opened our first café in 1990, we discovered that coffee had a unique way of uniting its drinkers in the pursuit of friendship and knowledge.
 
Burgie’s continually strives for excellence in our coffee. The finest quality Arabica beans are selected from countries of origin around the world. Through the combination of science and the roasters art, these select beans are transformed under the watchful eye of our skilled master roaster who diligently follows the exact specifications of our roast profile.
 
Here at Burgie’s we purvey extraordinary coffee, promote the lifelong pursuit of wisdom and believe that everyone has a story worth telling. As we passionately pursue these ideals, we want to help individuals in need, support causes close to our heart and encourage others to explore new stories. 
 
Now you know part of our story, we hope that our coffee helps to enhance your own.
 

Gratefully,
Steve and Anne Burgason 
Burgie’s Coffee and Tea Company
name: Burgies Coffee & Tea Company

At DRNK coffee + tea® we believe in challenging normalcy in everything we do. We certainly do thank mediocrity for the offer, but our concept doesn’t fit into that saturated market. Our journey started as the Atlanta Coffee Mills on Atlanta’s famous Peachtree Street in 1891 where we produced coffee for retail sale in grocery stores and for the hotels and restaurants and home delivery in Atlanta. Many changes have come over the years. Retail sales have moved from the grocery stores to our online store. Home delivery has gone by the wayside and private label packaging has grown dramatically. description:
Verde is a leading Export company in Egypt established in 2015 in cooperation with "Ismailia Frozen Foods"​ who are specialized in the freezing, processing and packing of frozen fruits and vegetables. Our products have been exported throughout the Middle East and many European countries including Germany, Portugal, Croatia, Bulgaria and UK in addition to the Gulf Area and Far East and many more. 

Today, Verde specializes in processing, freezing, packing and exporting a wide range of freshly harvested fruits and vegetables while preserving and enhancing their original quality. We guarantee the quality of each and every product we offer. Throughout the years we have established a formidable reputation that is reflective of our quality and hard work. Our unrivalled passion for quality and customer satisfaction is the reason why we are and where we are today. 

•	Our Factory:
We operate our own processing plants equipped with the highest quality of fruits and vegetables processing equipment and the latest freezing methods that guarantee that the product stays fresh until its consumption. Our factory is equipped with over 8,000 metric tons of cold store capacity, 4 BLAST freezing tunnels, and IQF Freezing Tunnel. Our factory produces an average of 70 tons/day of fruits and vegetables of premium quality.

We have a metal detector and each carton passes through it to guarantee zero presence of any foreign bodies with the products. Also, we apply all the required analysis (Microbiology analysis – Pesticides – Heavy Metals). We have a professional team of 160 workers and employees working around the clock to guarantee that the highest standards of quality are always met. Therefore, we can genuinely guarantee exceptional quality from the seed to your plate.

description:
The Simple Green® story began nearly 50 years ago, long before "environmentally friendly"​ products were mandated by law. Bruce FaBrizio and his father developed a safer alternative to the toxic cleaners being used to remove tannic acid, a by-product of coffee roasting, from roasting machinery. It took three years to perfect the biodegradable, not-toxic, non-flammable, non-abrasive formula. After its initial success, Bruce began selling Simple Green to automotive and industrial customers in 55-gallon drums; which he delivered in his van, for use as a cleaner on equipment and floors.

In 1979, just as initial retail marketing efforts were beginning to pay off, Bruce's father died. Bruce managed to keep the business alive and in 1981 gave his company the name it continues to carry — Sunshine Makers, Inc. Simple Green was then introduced nationally into several new markets including Hardware/Do It Yourself, consumer grocery & drug, GSA (government) and Club-Store classes of trade. 

In the early 1990s, Bruce created the Environmental Technology Division within his company in order to define the cutting edge of today's cleaning solutions and solidify his company's high standards for environmental responsibility.Today, millions of dollars have been spent to prove the safety and efficacy claims of Simple Green. Sunshine Makers, Inc. is still owned and operated by Bruce P. FaBrizio. 

Original Simple Green and the entire family of Simple Green products are a part of everyday life in millions of homes, commercial and industrial sites, not only in the United States but all over the world. Sunshine Makers, Inc. has its headquarters in Huntington Beach, California, with satellite offices all over the world. Simple Green is manufactured in Garden Grove, California; Lawrenceville, Georgia; Rydalmere, Australia and Bernburg, Germany. Additional distribution centers are located in Maastricht, Netherlands and Choisy le Roi, France.
name: Simple Green

description:
With over 25 years of experience developing and manufacturing particle characterization instruments, Bettersize is China’s No.1 player in the particle sizing business. Bettersize has introduced breakthrough technology in the field of particle size & shape measurement. By achieving high quality and superior performance, our instruments provide precise analysis results of particle size, particle shape, and powder characteristics, helping scientists and engineers to understand material properties, facilitate research and improve production efficiency.

Bettersize product line for particle size and shape analysis includes instruments of all needs and budgets, from basic to advanced research models. These instruments are widely applied in Pharmaceuticals, Battery materials, Mining and minerals, Metals, Chemicals and Surface coatings, measuring materials with size ranges from nanometer to millimeter. Focused on technology innovation, instruments manufacturing, application support and after-sales services, Bettersize provides expertise and professional solutions and assures customers the highest confidence in our products.

Particle analysis and testing

Bettersize instruments offer three categories of particle properties analysis – particle size distribution, particle shape analysis and powder characteristics testing. The parameters determined with these analyses are crucial to physical properties of raw materials and the final application of products. Intelligent software enables automatic pre-programmed calculation for all parameters including particle size distribution, refractive index, aspect ratio and etc. Measured results can be customized in multiple formats of graphs and tables, which can be exported as required.
name: Bettersize Instruments

description:
Norameda is one of the fastest-growing pharmaceutical companies in the Baltic States. Our success mainly lies within a deep knowledge of the CEE market and following regulations – we secured all necessary certificates and licenses, so pharmaceutical products we deal with are compliant with the strict requirements. 

As well as that, our team of professionals is well known for effectiveness, flexibility, loyalty and dedication to our clients and partners. Norameda is prominent in marketing and sales. 

We operate in B2B and B2C sectors and work closely with health professionals and scientists to ensure the highest quality products are delivered.

Norameda is a drug manufacturer and retailer with ownership of Smarty Pharmacy e-drugstores: “Gudručio vaistinė” in Lithuania, “Gudrinieku Aptieka” in Latvia, Kavalpea Apteek in Estonia, and Apteczka Mądrali in Poland.

Norameda operates in 9 countries with a total pharmaceutical market value of 13,934,501 million EUR and deals with around 300 different brands. To this day, 32 companies from 17 countries partner with Norameda. 

SERVICES
-         Certification and launching of production series (we have a Good Manufacturing Practice Certificate – GMP)
-         Wholesale distribution (we have a Good Distribution Practice Certificate – GDP)
-         Marketing and sales of medicines and medical supplies 
-         Distribution of medicines, food supplements and medical devices
-         Pharmacological vigilance 
-         Any other necessary processes to ensure we deliver safe and high-quality medicines.

PRODUCTS 
-	prescription medicine (43.97%)
-	hospital medicines (29.79%)
-	non-prescription (16.67%)
-	medical goods (9.57%)

description:
We design, manufacture and supply passive components for fiber networks. Everything we do at PLP CZECH REPUBLIC (MICOS) is designed to provide efficient, simple and innovated solutions to solve complicated tasks. We take extra care and steps to ensure our certified products with advanced functionality and new features are easy for our customers to use.

Our production facilities utilise the latest technologies and equipment for metal and plastics processing. We manufacture Fiber Distribution Products and Data Cabinets and offer a range of extended assembly services. We hold accreditations for ISO 9001, ISO 14001 and ISO 45001.

Our portfolio contains more than 1,000 items. We strive to fully optimize solutions to meet the high standards of our global customers’ expectations. The Fiber Distribution Products and Data Cabinets are manufactured in the European Union.

Our products are used extensively in the many FTTx scenarios – externally / internally and for business or residential scenarios. We provide a complete FTTx solution portfolio including Fiber Access Terminal Boxes, Fiber Optic Boxes, Fiber Distribution Hubs, Fiber Optic Closures, Fiber Optic Patch Panels, Fiber High Density Cabinets and Data Cabinets. We’ve also created the unique FibeRoad™ System, which can be used across all points of optical networks from small closures to large cabinets and will make deployment and maintenance a routine rather than challenge.

We aspire to see these products in use worldwide and currently supply them to over 70 countries. That’s something that we are incredibly proud of, and we take aim to build on that moving forward.

The company was founded as Micos Telcom in 1990. In 2019, it has become a part of the Preformed Line Products (PLP) company, a worldwide designer, manufacturer and supplier of fiber optic closures (COYOTE®), high-speed cross-connect devices and high-quality cable anchoring / control hardware, established in 1947.
name: PLP CZECH REPUBLIC (MICOS)

description:
True Value Marketing Services Private Limited (TVM) is one of the leading players in the Vending Business with more than two decades of experience. TVM is into Manufacturing, Distribution and Exports of Ready-to-Drink hot and cold beverages, freshly brewed Tea & Coffee, and automatic vending machines for beverages as well as snacks. All the products and the machines are marketed under the brand name of “Granules n Beans”. 

We believe that every customer is different and requires a unique solution. Hence, our endeavor has always been to provide customization beyond expectations. With this understanding we strive to offer complete vending solutions along with value added services to suit specific needs of customers. We currently serve corporate, public institutions, BPOs, MNCs, Hospitals, Malls, Railway Stations, Airports and so on.

TVM, a 100 crore company is one of the first company to launch unsweetened premix sachets and  also pioneered in providing Tea, Coffee, soups, Chocolate and Badam Milk variants in the vending solutions category and has served more than 18 crore cups per annum as on 2017.
Thanks to our state-of-art production and manufacturing facility, our business has spread across three verticals namely, Vending solutions, Retail and Exports. And since past 20 years, we have been serving freshness to our consumers by offering world-class instant beverages. No wonder our consumers regard us as the complete instant beverage solutions provider with wide range of flavours catering to everyone's taste palate.
name: Truevalue Marketing Services Pvt. Ltd.

We empower our 1000+ healthcare and pharma clients to achieve and maintain the highest quality standards across their supply chain. This is accomplished by allowing them to efficiently track, monitor, and forecast quality and sustainability compliance.

The secure, real-time capabilities of our cloud-based Audit Management Platform ensure access to crucial compliance data from anywhere, at any time.

description:
CRC Global Solutions was founded by Ronnie Mains as a local trucking and warehousing company based in Kenner, Louisiana. 

Since then, Ronnie has built the company into the global presence it is today, with over 1,000 employees working across 60 locations worldwide in one of CRC's rapidly expanding business units: CRC Logistics, Realty, Construction, Product Representation & Branding, and our internal charitable initiatives via WeCare! We Share!

CRC Logistics

CRC Logistics provides transformative end-to-end supply chain management and logistics services that adapt to fluctuations in demand, reduce your overhead, and grow your business. 

CRC Realty

With 30 years of combined experience and a passionate commitment to client satisfaction, CRC Realty provides personalized real estate and property management services designed to achieve and exceed your goals.

CRC Building

CRC Building's team of highly-skilled industry experts seamlessly executes construction projects of all sizes. We go above and beyond to deliver world-class facilities that are built to last.

CRC Brand 

CRC Brand Solutions specializes in taking products and product lines to the next level to reach customers around the globe. Whether you are seeking to launch a new product line or breakthrough stagnant sales, we leverage our expansive distribution network, experienced sales team and marketing experts to generate sustained success.

NOLA Brand

NOLA Brand was founded to promote NOLA-focused local businesses in promoting, marketing, and distributing locally made goods, including our own award-winning NOLA Brand king cakes & NOLA Brand coffee ethically sourced from Honduras, CRC's Central American Headquarters. 

CRC We Care! We Share!, is a 501(c)(3) non-profit dedicated to providing nutritious foods and resources to communities in need. 

The CRC Global family of companies encompasses a group of rapidly expanding business units with over 60 locations worldwide across five continents.
industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
name: CRC Global Solutions

description:
Meinberg is a global leader in time synchronization solutions. The company’s flagship IEEE 1588 grandmaster clocks and NTP timeserver appliances have set the industry standard for innovation, flexibility, and reliability – making them one of the market’s top network time synchronization solutions. 

The Bad Pyrmont, Germany-based company designs and produces a range of devices, including High-end PTP and NTP timeserver products, GPS, GLONASS, Galileo and BeiDou receivers, DCF77 / WWVB / MSF receivers, IRIG / AFNOR time code generators / readers, and an array of accessories (antennas, diplexers, converters, signal distribution systems, etc.). 

As a global company, Meinberg products are used around the world, delivering synchronization for mission critical applications in power grid/substation automation, digital broadcasting, telecommunication networks, aerospace, financial applications and cutting edge research. 
Together with its subsidiary Meinberg USA and Oregano Systems (a Meinberg Company), all of its products are also backed by a service network of distributors and partners located in over 40 countries.
name: Meinberg

description:
it all began in a garden.
Founder and CEO Michael Heinrich was in his grandmother’s garden in Germany when he learned about the power of food. An avid gardener and medical doctor, his grandmother taught him how to use food to fuel his mind and body. Michael initially pushed the lessons to the back of his thoughts as he began a career in finance. Quickly he discovered corporate culture prizes productivity over health. Michael found this perspective flawed, remembered his grandmother’s advice and put his own healthful ideas into practice. They worked.

Research has since proven that health and productivity go hand in hand, and the more healthful foods people consume during the day, the happier, more engaged, and creative they become. Supported with research, nutritionists, chefs and a mission, Michael founded Oh My Green. Healthful food became the foundation of our company, just as it’s the foundation for growth, creativity, productivity and happiness in our work and lives. Today that mission has expanded to bring in wellbeing through meditation, mindfulness and community events. And Oh My Green is now garten, the German word for “garden.”
name: Garten

description:
Zareen started its journey back in 1955, focusing the tea market in Middle East. During the past 60+ years, the company maintains and delivers its core value, which is highest possible quality, to all of its customers and expanded its product lines to rice, edible oils, balsamic vinegar, pineapple, sweet corn, cucumbers and tomato paste.

In order to keep the promise to deliver the highest quality, Zareen acquired and kept the best standard in the food industry which includes HACCP, ISO 22000:2005 and GMP for all of its product lines. 
To fulfill our promise of highest possible quality, we deliver our products from their best origins. Therefore, Zareen tea produced and packed in Ceylon (Sri Lanka), India (Assam) and Kenya. Zareen rice produced and packed in India and Pakistan, olive oil, grapeseed oil and balsamic vinegar produced and packed in Italy, corn oil, sunflower oil, rice bran oil, canned sweet corn and pineapple produced and packed in Thailand, Malaysia, Argentina, Oman, and UAE and pickles and tomato paste, as special products, produced and packed in Fars province of Iran.

With keeping the quality as our core value, Zareen managed to deliver a stream of healthy products in all of its existence. Moreover, thanks to its extensive network of production and distribution, Zareen manage to extend its presence across the Middle East, CIS and Europe.
name: Zareen Co

Rotronic offers industry leading measurement devices for relative humidity, temperature, carbon dioxide, differential pressure and water activity used in all industries where superior measurement accuracy, stability and reliability are essential. With over 55 years of experience, the Rotronic brand stands for Swiss precision specialized in measurement instrumentation and innovation, such as RMS, a modular real-time environmental monitoring system that enables regulated pharmaceutical customers to meet specific FDA/EU regulations and also supports customers within industrial applications to focus on product quality.

description:
ChildFund International (http://www.ChildFund.org) is a global child-focused development and protection agency and a founding member of the ChildFund Alliance.

ChildFund International works throughout Asia, Africa and the Americas — including the United States – to connect children with what they need to grow up safe, healthy, educated and skilled, no matter where they are. Last year, we reached 13.6 million children and family members in 24 countries. About 200,000 Americans support our work by sponsoring individual children or investing in ChildFund programs.

Since 1938, we have worked to help children break the generational cycle of poverty and achieve their full potential. We align what we learn from children with best practices in the international development field to develop and deliver programs that are supported by the generosity of sponsors and donors. Find out more at ChildFund.org.
name: ChildFund International

The delivery of top quality raw materials is based on exclusive cooperative agreements between Worlée and the countries of origin. With organic, sustainably manufactured and fairly traded products, this family-run traditional company based in Hamburg (Germany) is always one step ahead of market trends.

Worlée supports customers with product development and arranges workshops and tastings to select suitable formulations. Our research and development department detects worldwide trends and develops innovative product ideas so that Worlée can contribute to your success.

description:
“Regardless of cultural differences, tea brings people together. In the East, it is omnipresent: at village hostels in China, in tiny Egyptians cafes, in stations and trains, in Bedouin tents, and from street vendors. All kinds of business are conducted and the most secret of secrets may be shared over a cup of tea. Tea reaches across the generations.”

When creating the tea room Emilie and her Husband Alex wanted to re-create the atmosphere of the  tea rooms that Emilie used to enjoy visiting with her mother when she was living in France. Most of the decoration come from France and the pictures hanged on the wall represent the different places Emilie and Alex visited in France and other countries. From picking green tea in Chang Mai to enjoying a cup of tea in one of the most fine Tea Rooms in Paris.

The French Tea Room (or Salon de Thé) provides an inviting place to relax and connect with the community. It is a peaceful and quiet place where you can come alone or with friends to enjoy a delightful cup of tea.

Emilie’s French Teas is also a tea shop where you can buy fine teas by the ounce or by the tin. We offer a variety of teaware and accessories so you can enjoy the perfect cup of tea at home.

Classes and Private Tea party are also available upon request.
industry: Retail Health and Personal Care Products
name: Emilie's French Teas

description:
WASTEA, as our slogan "WAS TEA NOW LEATHER" indicates; we have found a solution to use dry industrial waste from Tea production (left overs with no future life cycle - 100% waste) to produce highest quality new generation material in order to replace real leather, PU & PVC. WASTEA is Vegan as well as 100% Sustainable which can be up-cycled & down-cycled, different solutions are ready to run. 
WASTEA can be integrated vertically in sectors, from Fashion over Automotive up to Furnitures, and many more. 
Additionally, compared to the most other sustainable materials in the market we have managed to create the real leather touch/feeling. 

Why Tea ? - Tea Plant itself is the most ecological friendly plant in the environment: there is not watering needed (perfect suiting geographical area), no use of pesticides, can be harvested 4 times a year, etc. 

Moreover, we have invented a unique recycling solution, in order to use the material after its lifecycle. 

Please contact us for more exiting information, we are happy to share.
name: WASTEA

description:
Mono - Home of the German producer of handcrafted design originals

Since 1959 Mono’s goal has been to develop designer products that follow no trend, they simply outlast all trends. Striving to produce items that do not decorate but function and have the highest standards of production, material and origin. This has not been a rare occurrence. Mono products have become part of permanent museum collections of modern and applied art. Mono friends elicit pleasure on a daily basis.

The Mono manufactory is in the North Rhine-Westphalian town of Mettmann. That is where Wilhelm Seibel I set the cornerstone, in 1895 with the founding of the Britanniawarenfabrik W. Seibel – the basis for the family enterprise, which today is led by the 5th generation. In 1959 the brand Mono was established with the introduction of Mono A.

Much has changed since then, and much has remained the same in the production process at Mono. With stubborn dedication traditional processes were kept under the belief that manual know how, the human eye and high end materials actually do make a difference.

www.mono.de
name: Mono Germany

description:

We are curious explorers, courageous pioneers, and ingenious inventors. Our colleagues across the globe love innovating with science and technology to enrich people’s lives with our solutions in Life Science, Healthcare, and Electronics. 

Together, we dream big and are passionate about caring for our rich mix of people, customers, patients, and the planet.

We believe in the positive power of science and technology. It has determined our actions since 1668 and inspires us to continue researching for a future worth living. As a family-owned company with over 350 years of experience, we stand for sustainability, responsibility, and innovative strength.

We take pride in being a diverse and inclusive company that values and fosters the talents and abilities of our employees. That's why we are always looking for curious minds that see themselves imagining the unimaginable with us.

description:
For more than 70 years, Dorsch Gruppe has been a respected and innovative consulting and engineering partner for industrial customers, private investors, and public institutions.

With its 7,200 employees, Dorsch is the largest independent planning and consulting company in Germany and is represented internationally with several branches and project offices in more than 50 countries. The focus is primarily on the areas of transport infrastructure, water and environment, innovative planning, architecture and urban development, as well as energy and industry. Dorsch plans and supervises projects in all life cycles in a responsible manner, both nationally and internationally. 

Germany-based Dorsch Gruppe (Consulting Engineers) consists of Dorsch Holding GmbH and its affiliated subsidiaries worldwide. Since 2016, Dorsch Gruppe is part of RSBG SE, the industrial investment company of RAG-Stiftung, Essen/Germany.
name: Dorsch Gruppe

description:
Sonneborn is the global leader in the manufacture and supply of the highest quality refined hydrocarbons, including White Oils, Petrolatums and Microcrystalline Waxes for use in both consumer and industrial marketplaces. Along with SonneNatural, a full line of 100% vegetable-based emollients, Sonneborn offers high purity ingredients for Personal Care, Pharmaceutical and Cosmetic markets. Sonneborn provides grades that meet the strict standards of USP, NF, BP, DAB, French Codex, EuP, Japanese and other pharmacopoeias. Sonneborn is committed to providing customers with premium products, progressive technical capabilities and dependable service so that they receive the very best value in the industry. The Adam Hall Group is a leading German manufacturer and distribution company that provides event technology solutions to business customers worldwide. Its target groups include retailers, dealers, live event and rental companies, broadcast studios and AV and system integrators in both the private and public sector, as well as industrial flightcase manufacturers. The company offers a wide range of professional audio and lighting technology as well as stage equipment and flight case hardware under its own brands LD Systems®, Cameo®, Gravity®, Defender®, Palmer® and Adam Hall®. 

Founded in 1975, the Adam Hall Group has developed into a collection of modern, innovative event technology companies. This includes the logistics park with 14,000 square metres of warehouse space at its corporate headquarters near Frankfurt am Main, Germany. Through its focus on value and service orientation, the Adam Hall Group has been presented with a number of international awards for innovative product developments and pioneering product design from prestigious institutions such as ‘Red Dot’, ‘German Design Award’ and ‘iF Industrie Forum Design’. In a collaboration with ‘Studio F.A. Porsche’ design agency, LD Systems® most recently introduced a groundbreaking vision in pro audio design with its MAUI® P900 modern column PA system, which than also received the ‘German Design Award’ for excellent product design.

#eventtech #innovation #design #proaudio #prolighting #stageequipment

For more than a hundred years, we’ve been meeting challenges for customers whose systems need to fly higher, dig deeper, stand stronger, and last longer — anywhere on, above, or below the earth.

Our core business is the regulation of power transformers. - 💛 Our Netiquette 💛 -
The purpose of our LinkedIn page is to offer information about products and solutions at Continental, about our company culture and about our actions and initiatives. Moreover, we would like to provide you with quick and easy contact for your questions and comments related to the above mentioned topics. We emphasize the importance of an appropriate and respectful style when communicating on our page and therefore we established the following community rules:
- Please post only comments related to the topics covered by this page.
- Treat each user in a respectful way, as you expect to be treated as well. Abusive language, aggression and bullying are not allowed on our page.
We therefore reserve the right to remove posted comments or any other content from this site:
- which is offensive or abusive,
- includes a commercial benefit or unwanted advertising messages,
- violates the rights of third parties as well as the right to intellectual property,
- which is irrelevant or misleading
- which is a spam (repeated duplicate posting)
- for any other reason deemed necessary to create a helpful and respectful community
The comments on our contributions reflect the opinion of individual users. Our LinkedIn page is frequently checked for possible violations as mentioned above. However, ongoing inspection of the content of the posted comments is not reasonable without concrete indication of a (legal) violation as mentioned above. We will immediately remove the relevant links if they are found to violate any aforementioned law or principle.
name: Continental

description: Founded in 2014, Coffee Cherry Co is an agricultural innovation with the potential to do some really great things for the world. Each year the billions of coffee beans that eventually make their way into the Americanos, lattes, and cappuccinos of the world are harvested by milling and extracting them from the coffee plant. The surrounding fruit is discarded, often dumped into rivers or left to rot in heaps. So we invented something better to do with it. Something that’s better for everyone. For food & beverage companies, it is an all-natural, clean-label, nutrient-dense and distinctly flavorful ingredient as a sustainable found food. For farmers and families in coffee growing countries, it creates sustainable jobs and a new revenue source for some of the poorest areas of the world. And, for the environment, it removes botanical waste from streams and soil, strengthening the land and lives of the people and species there.
name: The Coffee Cherry Co.

description:
Established in 1902, American Packaging Corporation (APC) is a family-owned flexible packaging converter and renowned leader in the North American packaging industry. With over a century of experience serving a wide range of markets, APC specializes in flexographic and rotogravure printing, multi-ply extrusion, and adhesive lamination of film, paper, and foil, as well as pouch and bag fabrication to meet a variety of requirements. Today, APC operates six Centers of Excellence in the United States with more than 1,200 talented, motivated professionals, including nationwide sales reps and field technical support.

At APC, we’ve built a reputation as the go-to source for effective solutions in flexible and specialty packaging serving the unique needs of many industries and even the most demanding applications. We’re able to uphold this reputation by delivering more unmatched quality of materials, unparalleled customer service and the most innovation possible, delivering a high-quality product on time, every time.

While our products are unsurpassed in the industry, it’s our process that truly sets us apart. We start by listening—really listening—to your unique needs, your timelines, and your budgets. From there, we work with you every step of the way to create a customized solution that respects your brand’s hard-earned reputation for quality. And we deliver—on time, on brand and on budget. It’s why we say with confidence that APC delivers the total package.
Focused Markets include Food, Beverage, Medical, Pharmaceutical, Personal Care, Household Products, Pet Care, and other Specialty items.

Our Locations:
Rotogravure Printing and Laminating Centers of Excellence:
       Columbus, Wisconsin
       DeForest Wisconsin
Flexographic Printing and Laminating Centers of Excellence: 	
       Story City, IA
       Chili, New York
       Cedar City, Utah
Engineered Laminations & Coatings Center of Excellence:
       Rochester, New York
name: American Packaging Corporation

description:
Huhtamaki is a key global provider of sustainable packaging solutions for consumers around the world, enabling wellbeing and convenience. Our innovative products protect on-the-go and on-the-shelf food and beverages, ensuring hygiene and safety, and help prevent food waste. We embed sustainability in everything we do. We are committed to achieving carbon neutral production and designing all our products to be recyclable, compostable or reusable by 2030. 

We are a participant in the UN Global Compact and EcoVadis has awarded Huhtamaki with the Gold medal for performance in sustainability. To play our part in managing climate change, we have set science-based targets that have been approved and validated by the Science Based Targets initiative. 

With 100 years of history and a strong Nordic heritage we operate in 37 countries and 114 operating locations around the world. Our values Care Dare Deliver guide our decisions and help our team of over 19,000 employees make a difference where it matters. Our 2021 net sales totaled EUR 3.6 billion. Huhtamaki Group is headquartered in Espoo, Finland and our parent company, Huhtamäki Oyj, is listed on Nasdaq Helsinki Ltd. Find out more about how we are protecting food, people and the planet on www.huhtamaki.com.
name: Huhtamaki

description:
“Experience meets innovation”

Since our foundation in 1936, we have developed into a specialist in the co-extrusion of multi-layer films for the food-packaging industry and are highly valued by our customers as a reliable and innovative partner. We provide solutions for all kinds of food packaging and have additionally become an expert in the production of films for the coffee capsules industry. Through many years of research and development and close coordination with our customers, we have developed a wide range of high-quality films which do not only meet hygienic and optical requirements, but also align with today’s growing ecological awareness. 

Our industry and technological expertise, combined with the constant investment into the newest technologies, enables us to produce complex multi-layer films with up to nine layers. Besides the base materials of Polystyrene (PS) and Polypropylene (PP), we use a wide variety of additives. This allows the production of diverse high-quality films, that meet even the most specific requirements of our customers. 

Through the development of our own biologically recyclable film in 2013, we have once again demonstrated our innovative strength, our commitment to sustainability and our ability to remain at the forefront of the industry. 

Join us on our quest to develop the packaging solutions of tomorrow.
name: ALMA Packaging AG

description:
THE PROBLEM: Single-use products that are only meant to be used for mere minutes shouldn’t exist for hundreds of years after they’re disposed of. Over 8 billion plastic straws ALONE litter beaches and coastlines and threaten wildlife. It’s time we took a stand against plastic and switched to a nature-friendly alternative.

WHAT WE DO: UrthPact is a contract manufacturer that specializes in the molding and assembly of compostable products made from renewable, nature-based bioplastics. Some of our 100% compostable products include straws, water bottles, caps, and labels, cutlery and coffee related products, including our compostable one-way degassing valves called evalv®. We are proudly 100% Made in the USA, from our materials to our manufacturing.

OUR SOLUTION: Our products will provide you and your customers with all of the convenience of single-use products without the environmental guilt. They’re certified to compost in industrial facilities in under 3 months and, in the case of our straws, in your backyard in under 6 months. We recognize the need for single-use products, and have learned how to create a world where consumption leaves no footprint.

OUR RESULTS: Our goal is to help keep 25 BILLION pieces of plastic from reaching oceans and landfills. As of the start of April 2020, we’ve already reached the 5.7 billion pieces mark. View the current count HERE: www.urthpact.com

WHO WE CAN HELP: In the long run, we’re here to help the planet. We target our products toward brands and distributors who do not do their own manufacturing. We provide our products to these customers under their own private brand labels.

HOW WE’LL HELP YOU: By providing our compostable products to your customers, you achieve sustainability initiatives internally, and support green initiatives worldwide. You can give your customers the satisfaction they expect at no extra cost to your company or the planet. Send us an inquiry to see how we can help you! → www.urthpact.com/contact/
name: UrthPact

description:

FITPAK Ambalaj;

Offers complete packaging solutions with high barrier PA/EVOH based 9 layer film line, printing and lamination machines for meat and dairy products, concentrated fruit juice, wine and catering, MAP and vacuum packing etc..
Our product portfolio also include PET based  semi rigid thermoformable bottom foil by laminating high barrier film. Easy open,  peelable,  re-closable, antifoging, lock seal top lidding films  with printed and unprinted versions.
Economical pallet cover “Stretch Hood” which nicely covers pallets of products such as raw material, white goods, ceramic, brick, beverages, biscuit . Thanks to its high elasticity. Stretch hood  has been included in our portfolio as it suits the conceptual approach of FITPAK.
We  provide services in the flexible packaging industry with our experienced staff and state of art extrusion, HD printing (10 colors), lamination and slitting machines.

FITPAK, which embraces an innovative approach through production and providing services, will  grow into a company with approximately 250 employees, which aims to produce 18.000 tons of film and 10.000 tons of printed packaging material through 5 multi-layered  high capacity extruders, 4 printing and 2 lamination machines, and bag production machines, which are to be completed soon within the 2. investment period.

description:
MAKHNO is an architecture, ceramics, and interior design studio. It has a recognizable style that combines eco-principles, innovation, handmade production, and contemporary art.

Founded in 2003 by designer, architect, ceramist and collector Serhiy Makhno, the interior design agency has become an ambassador of Ukrainian culture and design in the world, having received the title Best of the Best from the Red Dot Design Award, victories at The International Property Awards, The Architecture MasterPrize, IDA Awards, Restaurant & Bar Design, numerous publications in ArchDaily, Designboom, Dezeen, ELLE Decoration, Architectural Digest, FRAME, Wall Street Journal, etc. 

In total, architects company MAKHNO has more than 600 unique projects in 25 countries, more than 80 prestigious world awards, more than 1000 publications in major specialized publications, participation in major international exhibitions, and personal exhibitions in the top design galleries of our time. 

The studio is a member of The Society of British and International Interior Design and is included in the Forbes list.

MAKHNO's unique approach is a combination of futuristic forms and traditional techniques, as well as the use of natural environmentally friendly materials. In addition, the studio's works have a pronounced artistic component and are art objects. 

The designing firm has a workshop where ceramists from art and craft dynasties use authentic handmade techniques and their own know-how.
Visit the website of MAKHNO Interior Design Agency to explore our portfolio —  completed projects of apartment, cottage, museum designs, and other wonderful places. You can also browse and order works by talented artisans from the studio, which represent contemporary art objects. We have offices and representations in more than 10 countries worldwide.

WE ART THE WORLD
name: MAKHNO STUDIO

description:
The real estate business has changed in Palm Beach County and around the world. No longer do Realtors have exclusive control of all information about homes on the market. That information is now readily available to both the buying and selling public through the Internet. Today, most buyers are more likely to find their future home in Northern Palm Beach County -- Jupiter, Palm Beach, Palm Beach Gardens, North Palm Beach, Singer Island, Juno Beach, Tequesta or West Palm Beach -- online rather than in a newspaper. Indeed, surveys demonstrate that more than 90% of all home buyers use the Internet as a source for their new home search. Over 80% of recent buyers first found their home on the Internet. 

So, our goal at Tauber Real Estate Services is to provide you with an abundance of information on homes for sale from Palm Beach to Jupiter Island -- information about hundreds of communities in many different price ranges; information about the numerous lifestyle opportunities there are available, from golf to boating to tennis to fishing; and information about the location of shops, restaurants, schools, grocery stores and coffee shops throughout the Northern Palm Beaches. 

All of us at Tauber Real Estate Services will provide you with more than just that information. Our experience, expertise, knowledge, and commitment to the highest level of service will give you, our clients, a real and substantial competitive advantage. Our goal is to provide every one of our clients the ultimate real estate experience, whether they are a first time home buyer or buying or selling an upper bracket home. With our more than 30 years of experience and proven track record of success -- over $1 billion in sales -- we are uniquely positioned to make information work for you.
name: Tauber Real Estate Services, LLC

description:
Synerlink, a Barry-Wehmiller Packaging Systems company, is a trusted supplier of in-line filling technology for rigid packaging of dairy products and other food and beverages, as well as a leader in the design and manufacture of state-of-the-art integrated packaging lines for ultra-clean, extended shelf-life and aseptic products. 

Our objective is to offer to our customers flexibility in production, with the possibility to use versatile materials and formats, while ensuring food safety and maximum of performance. Our range of packaging equipment offers a broad range of solutions to meet your needs:

FS MACHINES FOR CUPS AND BOTTLES
Fill-seal machines can handle a large variety of cup and bottle shapes with filling volume from 50 to 2500 ml. These machines fill your product in preformed cups or bottles made in versatile materials such as glass, terra cotta, aluminium, plastic. 
The fill-seal machine for bottles is also available as a stretch blow molder/filler block. A sleeve label applicator for cups can be integrated on fill seal lines as well.

FFS MACHINES FOR CUPS
Synerlink Form-Fill-Seal packaging lines produce packaging in multipacks or in single cups for spoonable dairy products, compotes, jams and desserts. These machines use heat to convert plastic film into custom-formed cups that are filled then sealed and cut according to your SKU requirement.


WORKING AT SYNERLINK:
From an HR policy perspective, the company promotes equality and diversity, placing constant emphasis on the development of its employees by offering personalized career paths. The company also provides numerous benefits, such as telecommuting options, company performance-based bonuses, meal vouchers (ticket restaurant) or a company cafeteria, a favorable system for compensating travel expenses through additional pay or time off, complimentary coffee and much more.
name: Synerlink

description:
Camm Solutions is a greentech company that has developed the fully sustainable and commercially viable material solution CAMM to combat global (micro)plastic pollution and eliminate waste. 

CAMM represents a breakthrough in material science, copying nature's own processes. It's engineered to function like plastic, yet when it's time to decompose, it does so with care for the environment, integrating back into the ecosystem without leaving harmful traces. When laminated or extruded onto paper, CAMM rivals the properties of multilayer packaging. In the recycling process, the CAMM layer washes away, enabling complete paper fiber recovery – a stark contrast to typical packaging that retains microplastics.

Camm Solutions was initiated by Christoph Bertsch, a serial entrepreneur with over 25 years of experience, who was driven to solve the microplastic problem for one of his other companies. The CAMM idea resulted out of that quest. Supported by a diverse international group of shareholders representing the full CAMM value chain from raw material to recycling, close to €50M were invested to develop patented CAMM formulations and launch sustainable game changers like CAMM airpillows and stretchfilm. Today, CAMM embodies a practical vision of sustainability, proving that innovative ideas can create real-world eco-friendly solutions.
name: Camm Solutions

description:
Vacuum Packaging for dried food and non-food products.

Discover our unique system to vacuum pack large volumes. With vQm, big bags of 2000 litres can put under vacuum easily. In this manner, bulk commodities can be kept clean, free of insects, protected against humidity, while no funghi development can take place. Moreover, block shaped packaging and volume reduction leads to direct savings in transport, handling and storage.

The vacuum bags are suitable for products such as cocoa, rice, coffee, nuts & fruits, tobacco, dates, cereals, concentrates, you name it. Our brand-new valve system can also be used to safely vacuum pack fine products and powders. The bags keeps the product in safe conditions, also during transport.

The characteristics of the multilayer plastic membrane are defined, in order to maintain the water activity within safe limits and at the same time, maintain a suitable atmosphere, avoiding the deleterious effects (moulding, insects, mites, biochemical reactions, oxidations). 

The main advantages of vQm:
- Packed product is maintained at humidity, temperature and oxygen pressure
- Avoids deterioration
- Zero loss from bagging to opening
- No pollution by external atmosphere
- Optimal hygiene
- No insect infestation or damage.
- Decrease in transport costs
- Packaging from 100 up to 2.000 kgs
name: vQm Vacuum Packaging

description:

A family-owned company, Kaffa knew how to follow this market´s evolution, devoting oneself to the production of coffee capsules in Europe and Portugal. A family-owned company, Kaffa knew how to follow this market´s evolution, devoting oneself to the production of coffee capsules. Their coffee factory has a production capacity of more than 500 million capsules per year. Through fully integrated, controlled and automated processes, it produces, without any additives or chemical elements in its composition, 11 types of products: 10 types of capsules compatible with different coffee machine operating systems (namely capsules compatible with Nespresso machines*, Delta Q, Dolce Gusto*, Lavazza Point* and Expresso Cap*) and encapsulated coffee for the closed and exclusive brand system - the Kaffa system.

Holder of 6 certifications (national and international) of quality and food safety, Kaffa is, since 2015, the only player with Sative Certification (for organic coffee production), Quality Management System (ISO 9001) , IFS Food - International Food Stadard , BRC - British Retail Consortium (for hygiene, food safety and quality systems), UTZ (which guarantee responsible agricultural production and the supply of coffee, cocoa and tea) and  Fairtrade (which proves the purchase of coffee at a fair price , ensuring compliance with special social, economic and environmental standards). 

After 13 years totally devoted to home coffee consumption, in 2018 Kaffa begun to offer customized solutions for businesses (Kaffa Business) and integrated solutions to answer the needs of small/medium-sized businesses (Kaffa Horeca).

description:
Welcome to The Nomadic Coffee Company, where we bring the world to your cup. Our coffee is carefully sourced from the finest beans grown in some of the most remote and exotic locations around the globe. Our passion for exploration and adventure is reflected in each sip of our delicious coffee, which will take you on a journey through the rich flavors and aromas of our carefully crafted blends.

As a company of travelers and explorers, we understand the importance of ethical sourcing and natural ingredients. That's why we work directly with local farmers and cooperatives to ensure that our coffee is sustainably grown and harvested, without the use of harmful chemicals. We believe that by supporting these communities, we can help preserve the natural beauty of the regions we visit.

At The Nomadic Coffee Company, we are dedicated to delivering the freshest and most flavorful coffee possible. Our beans are roasted in small batches to ensure that each cup is packed with bold, rich flavor and enticing aromas. We believe that coffee should be an experience, not just a drink, and that's why we strive to bring you the best coffee possible.

Whether you're a seasoned traveler or a coffee enthusiast, we invite you to join us on our journey around the world. Discover new flavors, experience new cultures, and indulge in the rich, delicious taste of our coffee. Welcome to The Nomadic Coffee Company.
name: The Nomadic Coffee Company

description:
The Fazenda da Lagoa (NKG Fazendas Brasileiras) coffee plantation is situated in the northeastern part of the famous coffee growing region of Campo das Vertentes, in Minas Gerais, only a few hundred kilometers away from São Paulo and Rio de Janeiro, at an altitude of around 1,100 meters above sea level.

The origins of Fazenda da Lagoa date back to 1764, when the Portuguese crown donated the property to the so-called Jangada, the earliest ancestor of its agricultural director J. Paiva.

It is one of the oldest coffee farms in the region of the “Campo das Vertentes” and up to today has nearly maintained the same size. In fact, the first coffee tree of the municipal was planted here in the middle of the 19th century.

In February 2003, this medium-sized Brazilian coffee farm with its 3.720 hectares of land, which had been owned by the Aguiar Paiva family for many generations, became part of the farming activities of Neumann Kaffee Gruppe.
name: NKG Fazendas Brasileiras

description:
Nutrition isn’t complicated. For us, it’s natural.

We’ve been a leader in the research and development of carotenoid-based products for the last two decades and we take that role very seriously. This means we approach everything we do with a sense of wonder and a driving desire to find the best possible outcome or create the highest-quality product.

Sometimes we begin with an actual seed (from one of our tomato farms) and sometimes we start with the seed of an idea—maybe a health-related concern or even a question that was posed by one of our scientists on a quick coffee break. No matter how the process starts, we always go through extensive and time-consuming testing procedures, studies, and periods of refinement before ever bringing anything to market.

Our process takes a long time. And no, it’s not the easy way to do things. But when you’re fully committed to what you’re creating, you don’t mind putting in those extra hours, days, and years.

All of this work can lead any number of places. Sometimes it leads us to a brilliant and unexpected new discovery like our microencapsulation technique (which keeps ingredients stable and releases them slowly into the body) and of course all-new products (like our vegan-friendly red colorant). We devote ourselves fully to everything we make because manufacturing a proven-effective supplement isn’t enough. Our real hope is to improve industry standards by fostering a level of compassion and consciousness that all too often isn’t a part of the conversation.
name: Lycored

description:
fiskaltrust ensures that the sales tax, which each of us pays for every single purchase or consumption, also contributes to the improvement of our environment. Water pipes, power lines, internet infrastructure, public transport and much more are financed by the sales tax collected by the state.
The receipts of an individual shop operator are cryptographically linked and thus made unique and unchangeable. As a result, amounts on the receipts can no longer be manipulated, which leads to a transparent and fair payment of your paid sales tax by the shop operator to the state. 
We work internationally with cash register manufacturers who make our middleware part of their software and thereby make it accessible to hundreds of thousands of shop operators across Europe. In the individual countries, we work closely with a network of cash register resellers in order to provide the shop operators with the best possible support in implementing the applicable national rules and to share our expertise in the field of cash registers.
name: fiskaltrust

description:
The Bunn-O-Matic® Corporation – A History of Innovation and Commitment

Understanding and responding to customer requirements has always been important to the Bunn-O-Matic Corporation (BUNN®). Today, BUNN is a global partner you can count on for profitable, reliable beverage equipment and outstanding post-purchase support wherever customers are served. 

Since 1957, BUNN has been at the forefront of beverage equipment innovation: inventing the flat-bottom paper filter for commercial use, the pour-over coffee brewer, and the first commercial iced tea brewer that uses fresh leaves versus instant mix. As customers entered the digital age, BUNN also embraced sophisticated new technology to meet changing needs.

Each product launch is driven by an ongoing commitment to delivering the highest possible quality beverage in each cup, every time. With thousands of loyal commercial and home product customers, the BUNN brand is synonymous with honesty, integrity, courtesy and total value, all of which work together to uphold the company’s brand promise, A Partner You Can Count On™. 

The global headquarters are located in Springfield, Illinois, USA, where the company strives for total customer satisfaction through superior equipment and unmatched service with support from facilities in Iowa, the New York metro area, California, as well as in Mexico, Canada, United Kingdom, Germany, China, Hong Kong, and Brazil.

description:
Endicott was founded with the quest to create truly astonishing espresso. The espresso available was not authentic, and many tasted burnt (and still do to this day).

While the large roasters used drum roasting, we found air roasting to be far superior in retaining the flavors and allowing us to control the temperature accurately.

After much experimentation, we found the recipes that produced what we felt was truly astonishing espresso. Local coffee shops and espresso stands began using our coffee, and word spread.

Today Endicott is a proven alternative to the large corporate roasters, with many of our customers staying with us for 15 years! They appreciate how we slow roast our coffee in small batches, ensuring batches taste the same each time.

Endicott has grown a following both in Washington state, other states, and even other countries. Now we're building on our heritage, and would like everyone to experience a truly astonishing espresso! See less
name: Endicott Coffee Roasters

The Bean-to-Cup Experience

description:
The evolution of our company starts from the care for details.
For over 20 years, Quamar has focused on its products, constantly improving all its items to achieve top performance.
Today it is a company specialising in the production of a wide range of high-precision items, using high quality materials to meet the diverse demands of the increasingly demanding Horeca market, offering hard-wearing equipment and very efficient coffee grinders.

Several years of experimentation and constant improvements have led to the development of new methods, technologies and parameters to be complied with. 
The technology has allowed us to make objective progress in our research, measuring the particle size profile of the ground coffee produced by all our coffee grinders. Thanks to this evolution we have been able to perfectly fine tune the entire range of coffee grinders and start developing new solutions.
In fact, great emphasis has been given to designing the structure of the grinding wheels so as to make the shape of the ground coffee as even as possible, in order to offer maximum control from extraction within a given particle size class. 
This has led us to focus on what we think is the core of the grinding process and which is now also our new pay off: the shape of the coffee powder.

THE NEW CONCEPT “THE SHAPE OF THE COFFEE POWDER” STEMS FROM RESEARCH THAT PROVES THE FUNDAMENTAL IMPORTANCE OF THE PARTICLE SIZE AND HOMOGENEOUS SHAPE OF THE GROUND COFFEE PARTICLES.

Quamar coffee grinders are constructed in Italy only and made by hand by actual craftsmen, who are responsible for the appliance from the start of production to the final inspection.
The main features of our coffee grinders are sturdiness, simplicity of use and utmost reliability over time.
Our professional products guarantee top performance in terms of speed of delivery and consistency of the dose and they all feature excellent grain size curves.
name: Quamar

description:
Respect is at the root of our coffee -- respect for skilled growers, inspired sippers, dedicated staff, and each coffee tree itself. We source all beans from independent farmers in Honduras, whose coffee-growing experience goes back generations. Reversing the industry-standard supply chain economy, we pay fair wages to growers and even re-invest our own profits back into our farms, freeing our farmers to do what they do best: diligent and meticulous, quality organic growing. 

Our farms are all located at high-altitudes of around 5,000ft, where trees’ slower maturation allows more time for their fruit to reach optimal sweetness. Just as careful in our harvest, we choose only the top 1% of beans, measuring the cherries’ sweetness with a refractometer and hand-plucking only the fruits that qualify between 18 and 20 degrees Brix. In the art of drying, each bean is carefully monitored to reach optimal condition without damage to flavor and integrity -- whether using sun-driven techniques like natural and honey, or the more standardized washed process. Because our farms are all micro-lots, and thus process beans only in microbatches, we commit never to value quantity over quality. 

The Spirit Animal coffee that you receive is therefore the product of a different coffee industry, and the agent of a cultural change. It’s a new breed of café-- combining inspirational taste and sustainable reciprocity, for a stirring experience of proudly bold sipping.
name: Spirit Animal Coffee

description:
Over 110 years

It was in 1901 when Luigi Bezzera patented an innovative process for preparing coffee.
This was the first espresso coffee machine, which was exhibited at the Milan International Fair in 1906.

Over the course of time, the company underwent significant development, maintaining constant passion for this work, which has continued today with the fourth generation of the Bezzera family.

Continuous innovation and modern transformations have not changed the philosophy and tradition of the company, which proudly maintains its complete production line in its own facilities.


The Company

The company is characterized by a modern production facility and 70 employees, where the components and finished products are designed and manufactured onsite, through the use of state of the art continuous cycle robots and modern numerical control machinery.

Bezzera produces professional and semi-professional espresso coffee machines, exporting its products to approximately 50 countries around the world thanks to a carefully selected network of resellers.

The quality of Bezzera machines has always been the prime objective of the Research & Development Department, which collaborates with the technical services provided by its resellers for continuous improvement of the products, periodically implementing technical updates and training on the culture of espresso coffee.


The production process

The entire Bezzera espresso machines production process takes place inside the company, with the utmost care taken in every stage, starting from the selection of raw materials.

Particular attention is given to human resource development and the continuous technological upgrade of the machinery, fundamental elements to obtain the best final products recognized for their excellent construction, typical of Made in Italy products.

The severe final inspections carried out for each Bezzera machine guarantees the reliability which makes our brand so well known around the world.
name: Bezzera

It was small but mighty- a welcoming space for the neighborhood to gather around great food, pastry, and coffee that also provided a sense of home and belonging.

Tatte continues to grow with more cafes opening in Greater Boston, Washington, D.C., Maryland, and Virginia. Each cafe has its own personality and style but always stay true to the original spirit of Tatte: A place of gathering that brings inspiration, comfort and joy…a place where you feel like you belong.

DREAM & GROW WITH US
At Tatte, we are a team from diverse backgrounds working together To Inspire, Care for, and Nurture Life. Every day. We invite anyone who is passionate, ambitious, genuine, loves people, and wants to serve delicious food, pastry, and coffee to join our team. We are looking for people who appreciate and respect what we do and are truly excited to take part in our journey. There are many different ways to join our team and the opportunity for growth is there for those wanting to learn and build a career with us.

OUR MISSION & VALUES
As Tatte, we share a mission To Inspire, Care for and Nurture life. Every Day.
Working together, we aspire to and live from four core values:
 -Uncompromising Quality & Craftsmanship
 -Always Learn, Grown, Be Curious & Creative. Have Fun.
 -Be Kind. Practice Empathy – the Rarest and Purest Form of Generosity
 -Integrity: Doing the Right Thing the Right Way Matters

POSITIONS ON OUR TEAM
We’re hiring General Managers, Assistant General Managers, Cafe Managers, Café Head Chefs, Sous Chefs, Kitchen Managers, Counter Staff, Baristas, Line Cooks, Prep Cooks, Dishwashers, Pastry Chefs, Pastry Cooks, Bread Bakers, and many others…

Find out more at http://tattebakery.com/careers!
name: Tatte Bakery & Cafe

description:
From our humble beginnings in 1979 when Ray opened the first Nudy’s Café in Devon, we have stayed a family-owned, hands-on business. In fact, you’ll probably meet Ray at your favorite Nudy’s Café location, if you haven’t already…he visits each of the cafés daily. That’s why our customers see us as part of their community, not a chain.

“We’ve been lucky,” says Ray. “From those days decades ago when I made hoagies, Nudy’s Café has grown because we’re a place where friends can eat and spend time, not a fortune.”

If you’re new to our cafés, come in and experience our award-winning food, friendly staff, small-town ambience or convenient take out food. No matter which Nudy’s Café you select, you’ll find the atmosphere comfortable, the service reliable, and the food delicious.

To all our loyal customers – thanks a lot. And the next time you come, bring your friends. And your appetite.
name: Nudy's Cafes
