description: Tega & Tula Special Coffee Farm Agro-Industry Plc has been growing, processing and exporting some of the world’s finest coffee in Ethiopia. Our vision is to produce high quality coffee on an environmentally sustainable, economically viable and community friendly farm. We own one of the youngest coffee growing plantations in Ethiopia, using the most progressive farming and harvesting techniques to plant, produce and deliver the best coffee to domestic and foreign markets. Our farms are located in the heart of Kaffa site (Kaffa Zone Gembo Woreda), Gesha site (in Gesha Woreda) and Sheka Zone Anderacha Woreda Shaera Kebele with a total size of 1100+ hectare land. Our farms are confined within UNESCO preserved Kaffa and Sheka biosphere. We supply traceable, organic coffee with RFA, NOP, JAS and EU certifications. We offer washed, sun-dried and specialty green arabica coffee with unique characteristics, flavor and aroma categorized in line with predominant growing ecologies.
name: Tega & Tula

description:
Medellin Mill (part of TMO Import Export SAS) is a specialised coffee processing plant located in Rionegro, antioquia, Colombia. 

Medellin Mill provides a much-needed service for high quality preparation of specialty coffee. Our service is available to small exporters and especially farmers with direct clients abroad. TMO Imports Exports SAS and its partners The Coffee Quest US and The Coffee Quest Europe can provide a door-to-door service of the whole supply chain, for independent farmers, opening up a world market they would not be able to access any other way. 
Medellin Mill provides the highest quality milling, selecting and packing possible for micro lots in Antioquia. We can package in traditional burlap bags, big bags, high protection GrainPro bags and ultra protective vacuum packs. We can offer the full supply chain from farm to client in the Americas, Europe and Australasia transporting the coffee by sea or air to anywhere in the world. 
Medellin Mill was designed with quality in mind. Our state of the art equipment is the most advanced in the market guaranteeing the best processing possible. Our quality team and cupping lab make sure each coffee that leaves our plant has been checked and complies with the highest international standards for flavor, hygiene and and defect count.
name: Medellin Mill

description:
Unlock New Horizons for Your Export Business 

At Stephen Phillip International (SPI), we enable African exporters to expand regionally and globally. With our expertise and trade solutions, capitalize on new opportunities.

For Manufacturers Seeking Production Investment

SPI raises capital from private equity partners investing in Africa. Develop your investment case and get it in front of ideal impact investors. Get advised on positioning your company for investment readiness. Secure the financing to increase production capacity.

Tapping into Africa’s Production Opportunities

Discovering Africa's Untapped Bounty

description:

The company’s global purchasing footprint covers upwards of 30 countries, and the company trades in more than 35 types of paper. 

In 2007, Cycle Link was established in the US. Not long after, Cycle Link set up offices in the UK, Japan, Australia, and Europe.

In 2018, Cycle Link International purchased about 2 million MT of recycled wastepaper globally, accounting for about 12% of China's annual wastepaper imports, ranked the third place among the country. 

Since 2016—and even during the Pandemic—Cycle Link has consistently ranked Cycle Link in the top 20 exporters in the United States by the Journal of Commerce. 

Cycle Link believes in creating value for customers, building a supportive platform for employees, and benefiting society through environmental sustainability. 

Cycle Link International is continuously forging its path to success!

description:
Among the world’s 10 largest manufacturers and suppliers of polished diamonds, MID House of Diamonds is a multinational company with the capacity of fulfilling the comprehensive requirements of its clients in the retail and jewelry manufacturing sectors, 24 hours a days and seven days a week, from multiple geographic locations in North America, Europe and Asia. 
Headquartered in Israel and with sales offices in Antwerp, New York, Los Angeles, Hong Kong, Shanghai, London and Tokyo, MID operates an international network of factories, producing high-quality polished diamonds in all shapes and colors, in sizes from as low as 10 points to stones of plus-10 carats. With an ability to supply individual diamonds as well as to fill bulk orders, its international clientele ranges from mom-and-pop stores to many of the world’s most well-known jewelry chains and brands.
With roots in the diamond and jewelry business stretching back more than half a century, MID was established by two brothers, Benny and Yossi Meirov. And while the company has grown into a globe-encompassing corporation, with all the benefits and economies of scale that are enjoyed by a firm of its size, it remains at its core a family-run operation, where personal relationships are guaranteed, and reputation and integrity are forever core principles.
A perennial fixture on Israel’s official top diamond exporters list, taking the number one spot in both 2015 and 2016, in 2011 it was named the recipient of the country’s Outstanding Diamond Exporter Award. 

PRODUCTS & SERVICES
•	Polished diamonds in all shapes, colors and sizes, from 0.10 carats to +10.00 carats.
•	Parcels, single stones, matched pairs and layouts.
•	Certified stock, with grading reports from GIA, EGL, AGS, HRD and IGI.
•	Premium cuts to value cuts in all shapes.
•	Natural fancy colored diamonds, available both as loose stones and set in one-of-a-kind customized jewelry.
•	Clarity-enhanced and HPHT diamonds.
name: MID House Of Diamonds

description:
Jaguar Freight is a licensed freight forwarder and NVOCC and an expert in global supply chain logistics.

Clear supply chain leadership, expertly coordinated around the globe, backed by an exceptional degree of customer care. That’s what Jaguar delivers.

Founded in 1993 in New York and London, our roots are in logistics. As we’ve grown with our customers, we’ve developed state-of-the-art technology expertise that transforms logistics and shipping services into world-class supply chain solutions.

Personalized global supply chain solutions backed by powerful technology.

A team of dedicated professionals.
Our team at Jaguar is friendly, efficient, and thoroughly professional; with a dedicated customer service team led by a senior account manager who serves as your personal point of contact, your satisfaction is our ultimate goal.

Precise technology.
Implementing the CyberChain™ suite, we empower our clients with the industry’s leading software, which provides deep visibility and actionable intelligence into your entire supply chain. The CyberChain™ suite is composed of four data-driven, intuitive technology modules: Each module can be implemented in combination or individually to accommodate your objectives, budget, and scale of business.

Solutions-driven.
Our solutions-driven approach identifies your logistics needs, finding ways to move your freight more efficiently, more conveniently, with fewer soft costs and disruptions. We pride ourselves in being nimble and responsive solution providers.

Where logistics expertise meets custom software, there's Jaguar.

“I have very few concerns once a shipment is handed over to Jaguar, knowing it is in secure hands.”
-Keith Fromelt, CEO of Strivectin

description:
Belenco Kuvars Yüzeyleri, üstün teknoloji, kaliteli üretim ve tasarıma verdiği önem ile dünya kuvars yüzeyler sektörüne hızlı giriş yapan genç ve dinamik bir markadır. Yaratıcı düşünce, innovasyon ve modernliği mükemmel tasarımlarına yansıtan Belenco, dünya kuvars yüzeyler pazarında iş ve iş yapış modellerine reformist bir yaklaşımla merhaba diyerek yaşam alanlarının yeni trend belirleyicisi olmuştur. Hayattan ilham alan ve hayata ilham veren yaratıcı bir ürün olarak tasarlanan Belenco Kuvars Yüzeyler, yaşam alanlarına eşsiz tasarım ürünleri sunmak hedefiyle, bilimi teknolojiyle, kuvarsın eşsiz özelliklerini ise tasarımla buluşturan bir yaklaşımla üretilmektedir. 

2010 yılında kurulan ve Manisa Organize Sanayi Bölgesi'nde son teknolojilerle temelleri atılan Belenco fabrikası, 2011 yılının sonbaharında Türkiye'de ve dünyada tüm yaşam alanları tasarımcılarını benzeri olmayan Belenco Kuvars Yüzeyleri ile tanıştırmıştır. Eşsiz tasarım imkanları ve kuvarsın dayanımının üstün teknolojilerle birleşmesi sonucunda, tüm doğal taşlardan ve diğer tezgâh malzemelerinden çok daha üstün özellikler sunan Belenco Kuvars Yüzeylerin üretimi Manisa'daki fabrikasında Eylül ayında başlamıştır.

description:
Whether for beer, wine, soft drinks, coffee or water, as a full-range supplier, SCHÄFER Container Systems has the right reusable KEG for every beverage. All over the world millions of SCHÄFER KEGs are used by internationally renowned beverage producers as well as small regional businesses. We manufacture exclusively reusable products on the basis of high-grade stainless steel. Take advantage of our extensive services covering KEG branding, volume reduction, KEG configuration by App and much more.

Reusable stainless steel-KEGs
KEG volumes of 5 – 58 litres, DIN, Euro, US and slim-line diameters, we can supply the right KEG. Choose from 100% steel KEGs, PU-coated PLUS KEGs, KEGs with coloured top and bottom rings, Party-KEGs or small-scale professional dispensing system.

KEG branding 
Numerous branding processes enable you give your stainless steel KEG a personal design. Your KEG can be completely coated in foamed polyurethane of any corporate colour you choose. Alternatively, coloured top and bottom rings of polypropylene can also highlight your corporate design. And even the classical stainless steel KEG has enormous branding potential.

KEG service
Extend the service life of your KEG stocks or allow yourself to react flexibly to sales fluctuations or market changes.

KEG traceability
All SCHÄFER Container Systems’ KEGs can be provided with permanently integrated coding system of your choice, such as character code, barcode, transponder or datixPLUS, guaranteeing more transparency in your logistics and making comprehensive container management possible.

KEG accessories
Besides high-quality reusable stainless steel KEGs, we also supply perfectly matching accessories.
name: SCHÄFER Container Systems

These systems enable the consistent production of a controlled range of dry ice products for food transportation, cold chain management and dry ice cleaning. Customers are using our technology-based solutions to replace outdated processes that are inefficient and harmful to environment and worker safety.

Cold Jet is headquartered in Loveland, Ohio, with international operations in Europe, Asia, Canada and Mexico. For more information, visit www.coldjet.com or call 1-800-337-9423 or +1-513-831-3211 (International).

description:
Limitech is a Danish manufacturer of multifunctional batch mixers, cookers and special made products for the Food, Skincare & Pharma industry. We supply both stand alone machines as well as full process lines.

The Limitech mixing wheel is the key component in our design and has led to Limitech providing one of the world’s best systems for mixing liquid and semi liquid products. Our mixers are used by leading companies around the world.

Limitech was founded in 1993 by Anders Jellesen.  With over 42 years of experience building food process lines, Anders’ vast industry knowledge forms the company’s foundation to the beneﬁt of all our customers. Today the tradition continues with second generation, Jesper Jellesen, and customers can expect the same high level of presence and ﬂexible approach that has been the basis of our company ever since the beginning.
 
We are totally committed and extremely passionate about producing the most ﬂexible and efﬁcient food systems possible.

Contact us now at limitech@limitech.dk

description:
This is the official ETS Global page on LinkedIn.

ETS Global B.V., a wholly-owned subsidiary of ETS, is the international arm of ETS that brings ETS expertise to educational and business communities around the world.
At non-profit ETS, teams are passionate about their mission to advance quality and equity in education for all people worldwide because they believe in the power of learning. ETS teams strive to provide innovative and meaningful measurement solutions that improve teaching and learning, expand educational opportunities, and inform policy.

At ETS Global B.V., we bring expertise to educational and business communities around the world, including companies, language schools, academic institutions, and public service organizations. ETS Global serves 80 countries across Europe, South America, Asia, the Middle East, and Africa. We offer a range of ETS products, services and learning solutions, including English-language assessments, standardized assessments, training, and consulting.

In 2020, ETS Global B.V. has acquired Pipplet, a start-up specialising in language assessment used for recruitment, internal mobility, language audits and skills certification for companies. With assessments in 28 different languages, from English to Vietnamese, Pipplet is speeding up the recruitment process for hundreds of companies, from fast-growing start-ups to large consulting groups.
name: ETS Global B.V.

We are also represented in other countries via our network of partners.

MPDV has a cross section of customers, from medium sized to international global players, involved in rubber and plastics manufacturing, automotive suppliers, food and beverage industry, production and mechanical engineering, furniture manufacturers, primary processing industry, printing and packaging, steel processing, optical industry and precision engineering, medical and pharmaceutical industry, electronics and electrical industry.

We offer pioneering solutions for competitive businesses with innovative and sophisticated MES systems of high quality and a broad range of services.

Awards given to MPDV vouch for our role as a market leader: Frost & Sullivan not only awarded MPDV with the MES Best Practice award but also with the Global MES Award. Also, MPDV was given the TOP 100 Innovator award indicating that we are one of the most innovative medium size companies in Germany.

description:
The HOMAG Group is the world's leading provider of solutions for the woodworking industry.

Our customers use high-tech machines and systems from the HOMAG Group to produce home and office furniture, kitchens, parquet and laminate flooring, windows, doors, staircases and even complete prefabricated timber-frame buildings. 

The range of machines and systems available extends from individual machines for trade businesses to complete, networked production lines for highly industrialized, individual furniture production. Our wide range of services related to the machines and systems together with the corresponding control software makes our offering unique. 

With a market share of over 30 %, we are the world market leader in our industry. More than 1,000 active Individual protection rights prove our innovative strength. As part of the HOMAG Group, you can look forward to 6,500 new colleagues from almost every region of the world.
We are looking forward to meet you in one of our 14 production facilities and over 20 sales and service companies!

description:
Crane Payment Innovations is the leader in world-class, automated payment solutions. We partner with businesses to provide payment experiences that set new and innovative standards for consumer convenience, security, and reliability. We are excited to explore new ways every day to improve how millions of people across the globe can make their payments in a way that fits with their lives. Our global engineers develop products and deliver innovative solutions in currency validation technologies, cash management systems, digital payment technologies, mobile applications, security, and digital advertising. We offer a range of devices for bill and coin validation, cash recycling and dispensing systems, IoT applications for our enterprise-level connected products and services, and software applications to integrate sensory hardware to machines and networks.

At CPI you will become a valuable part of an inclusive culture of collaboration and innovation with the support of over 3,100 associates working in one of our 65 sites across the world. If you want to have a hands-on, global impact on payment solutions, we want you to join our team.

We offer 
•	Competitive salaries
•	Paid and Sick time off
•	Medical, dental, & vision insurance 
•	Life insurance and disability benefits 
•	401K with Company contribution
•	Community involvement
•	Opportunities to travel and work at our global sites

Crane Payment Innovations (CPI) is part of Crane NXT, a premier industrial technology company. CPI provides a full range of unattended payment solutions aimed at the Gaming, Retail, Transportation, Vending and Financial Services applications. CPI is built on the technological heritage and market expertise of the Conlux, MEI, NRI, CashCode, Telequip, Money Controls, and the Cummins-Allison brand. CPI is headquartered in the United States with further offices, manufacturing facilities, distribution, and service centers worldwide.
name: Crane Payment Innovations

The core team of United Micro Technology consists of senior experts in the global wireless communications industry. Based on the latest 3GPP protocol standards, the company conducts research and development of eMBB, Redcap and narrowband products, and is highly committed to becoming a world-class provider of Smart Wireless Connectivity solutions.

We offer proprietary innovative technologies for optimized biopharmaceutical manufacturing and analysis. ProBioGen also provides process development services and manufacturing technologies for viral vaccines.

Our additional new building houses 1000 L single-use bioreactor capacity to keep up with the ever-increasing demand from our clients. A second 1000 L single-use bioreactor is coming soon.
With over 25 years of experience in animal cell culture, combined with innovative scientific excellence and a strong intellectual property base, we cover the entire drug development value chain end-to-end.

watch & learn more: https://youtu.be/vtEgrEVfj70

description:
SPARETECH develops a collaboration-platform for manufacturing companies to digitize their inventories of spare parts, calculate their real demand, compare parts from different suppliers and source the appropriate part outside or within their production network.

"COLLABORATION-PLATFORM FOR SPARE PART MANAGEMENT"​

SPARETECH provides a holistic spare part database with integrated machine learning to increase machine uptime and lower costs.

The software matches client's spare part lists to the product database and creates standardized data sets for ERP-systems. The data is enriched with technical specifications to improve comparability, which enables the customer to leverage sourcing and usage within production network.

Maintaining the data is no longer required by the client, as SPARETECH provides product updates (e.g. discontinued parts) and alternative sourcing possibilities
name: SPARETECH

description:
KROHNE is a world-leading manufacturer and supplier of solutions in industrial process instrumentation and offers supporting products and services for one-stop-shopping and in industries as widespread as oil & gas, water & wastewater, chemical & petrochemical, food & beverage, power, minerals & mining and marine.
With flow, level, temperature and pressure measurement as well as process analytics, KROHNE offers the whole range of process measurement instruments. 

Since KROHNE was founded in 1921, KROHNE has steadily grown into a global enterprise and employs today more than 4,100 people with total sales of 652 million Euros.

KROHNE is present on all 5 continents with 16 production facilities in 11 countries, 44 self-owned companies and joint ventures and 55 exclusive representatives. This means you can deal with a contact or a local office wherever you are.
name: KROHNE

description:
MechSyn synthesizes high-performance materials through mechanochemistry, transforming fossil-fuelled processes into electrically powered ones.

Our patented grinding methods and highly specialized functional materials for the chemical, energy, electronics, automotive and aerospace industries enable our customers to reduce costs and improve process efficiency while protecting the environment.

Our materials can be used in a wide variety of applications, including catalysts, catalyst supports for chemical production, conductive fillers for PEM fuel cells, and much more.

MechSyn is a spin-off from Max-Planck-Institute für Kohlenforschung and is funded by the EXIST Research Transfer Program of the German Federal Ministry of Economics and Climate Protection.

As a science-based company, we place particular emphasis on research and development activities for new, disruptive market solutions that can replace or significantly complement conventional methods and products.
name: MechSyn

Reasonance is also behind the MLOps platform ATLAS which helps organizations streamline their machine learning operations. The platform supports end-to-end machine learning workflows, from data preparation and model training to deployment and monitoring, providing a seamless and integrated experience for data scientists and developers alike. By leveraging ATLAS, organizations can reduce the cost and time-to-market of their machine learning initiatives and ensure that their ML solutions make it into production.

description:
WeVee® Technologies is an international deep tech/ cleantech company dedicated to developing, operating and licensing technology platforms, which accelerate the switch to e-mobility and sustainable consumption. Headquartered in London with its Central European Operations based in The Netherlands, Germany is the first market to launch in its European expansion plans.

WeVee provides a fully managed service for medium and large corporates, responding to their growing need for ESG compliance and leveraging the financial incentives that come with it. 

WeVee’s end-consumer solution is powered by a community app and a demand driven marketplace platform to create unique and individualised experiences for each driver that makes the transition to eVehicles simple and seamless.

Our mission is to lower carbon emissions by accelerating the switch to electric vehicles and clean energy. Through empowering companies and individuals, with a revolutionary electric mobility ecosystem, we literally drive the behavioural change needed towards more sustainable living. Together with our partners, we confront head-on the pain points around eMobility, and turn them into an enjoyable and hassle free experience. 

WeVee Tech is an equal opportunity employer, committed to inclusion and diversity.

description:
TechnoServe works with enterprising people in the developing world to build competitive farms, businesses, and industries. We are a nonprofit organization that develops business solutions to poverty by linking people to information, capital and markets. Our work is rooted in the idea that hardworking people can generate income, jobs and wealth for their families and communities. With five decades of proven results, we believe in the power of private enterprise to transform lives.

Our success in creating business solutions to poverty is due in large part to our talented and highly committed team. TechnoServe employs more than 1,500 people, the vast majority of them host-country nationals working in the field. Our staff combine business expertise with local knowledge, relationships, and context to help hardworking men and women generate income, jobs and wealth for their families and communities. 

In 2020, TechnoServe's work helped transform the lives of 1.3 million people in Puerto Rico as well as countries throughout Africa, Latin American, and Asia by targeting improvements in farms, businesses, and industries. Learn more about our impact at www.technoserve.org/impact
name: TechnoServe

description:
Endego is a leading Polish provider of engineering and software services based in Krakow, Poland. We believe that the foundation of every successful project is experience, commitment, and reliability, which is why we go above and beyond to ensure that we meet the highest standards and exceed expectations for our clients worldwide. 

At Endego, we pride ourselves on delivering engineering solutions that exceed our client’s expectations. Our team is dedicated to providing personalized service, transparent communications, and a commitment to quality that ensures your project is completed on time and within budget.

We are committed to excellence in everything we do, from concept, design, prototyping, and serial phase to supporting production launch.

We collaborate closely with our clients, bringing a deep understanding of their needs and goals to every project. Whether developing new technologies, optimizing existing systems, or solving complex problems, we are driven by a passion for positively impacting mobility progress.

Through our engineering solutions, we create modern, sustainable, and exceptional projects from automotive, commercial, off-highway, and production lines to healthcare and beyond. We want our designs to improve the quality of life around us.

Join us on our journey. Let’s GO!

description:
Life at home has been at the heart of our business for 111 years - it is why we exist and why we are passionate about what we do. Beginning with our founders to the everyday actions of our people, our values have always kept us grounded -- Integrity, Respect, Inclusion & Diversity, One Whirlpool, Spirit of Winning. What we do at Whirlpool Corporation matters because consumers trust our brands. We never take that for granted and we work every day to earn that trust as we are committed to being the best kitchen and laundry company, in constant pursuit of improving life at home.

ABOUT WHIRLPOOL CORPORATION 
Whirlpool Corporation (NYSE: WHR) is committed to being the best global kitchen and laundry company, in constant pursuit of improving life at home. In an increasingly digital world, the company is driving purposeful innovation to meet the evolving needs of consumers through its iconic brand portfolio, including Whirlpool, KitchenAid, Maytag, Consul, Brastemp, Amana, Bauknecht, JennAir, Indesit, Yummly and InSinkErator. description:
The Specialty Coffee Association is a nonprofit, membership-based organization that represents thousands of coffee professionals, from producers to baristas all over the world. Built on foundations of openness, inclusivity, and the power of shared knowledge, we act as a unifying force within the specialty coffee industry – invested in creating a worldwide circle of like-minded professionals.

Unified but not uniform, we celebrate and nurture diversity. We understand the importance of local knowledge and strive to connect every individual with the resources to improve their opportunities and make their voice heard on a global stage.

Representing a global pool of experience and talent, we are our members and together we work towards a better, more sustainable future for each and every one of us – wherever in the world we are. 

Becoming part of the specialty coffee community brings added benefits, such as access to our industry guilds for Baristas and Roasters, as well as local events and activities organized and supported by our global network of National Chapters. If your business is coffee, then this is the place for you. Explore, collaborate, progress and inspire as we build a sustainable future for coffee, today.

For more, see the international page: https://sca.coffee/
name: Specialty Coffee Association of Denmark

description:
The 4C Association aims to unite all relevant coffee stakeholders in working towards the improvement of the economic, social and environmental conditions of coffee production and processing to build a thriving, sustainable sector for generations to come.

We are the leading multi-stakeholder sustainable coffee platform, guiding the mainstream sector toward more sustainable production in a non-competitive arena where all relevant stakeholders are abled to participate.

The 4C Association (Common Code for the Coffee Community) sets, maintains and operates the 4C Code of Conduct, an entry-level standard that defines a global common baseline and starts all coffee supply chain actors on the path to the sustainable production, processing, and trade of coffee.
name: 4C Association

description:
Grounds for Health works with coffee-growing communities to establish sustainable women's health programs & cervical cancer prevention programs.

Together with our coffee cooperative partners, we break down the barriers that stand between women and preventive care—such as lack of information, transportation and the social permission she needs so she can put herself first and seek care.

To make sure our programs are sustainable, we invest in the education and training of community health promoters, doctors and nurses. Our model uses technologies that are appropriate for low-resource settings, including the Single Visit Approach to detection and treatment of cervical pre-cancers.

This is a problem with a solution. Join us.

description:
PJ's Coffee of New Orleans is based in the coffee capital of the world. The history of coffee in Louisiana is rich and strong. For more than two centuries, the finest coffee beans from around the world have always come here first. Coffee arrived in New Orleans in 1720 when French explorers introduced it to the city. Today, one third of all the coffee in North America lands first on the docks of the Crescent City. Savor a cup of coffee almost anywhere in North America and you'll taste New Orleans. Naturally, the largest coffee roasting plant in the world is located here too. Every cup of coffee PJ's best represents our commitment to the legacy and culture of the Crescent City.

We travel the globe to hand-select only the finest coffee beans - from Sumatra to Ethiopia, from Colombia to Kenya - everywhere the best coffee grows. Plucked be hand at the peak ripeness, the fruits of the Coffea Arabica bush are transported to mills where the beans are expertly removed, dried and hand-sorted before shipping to our artesian roasters.

The "PJ"​ in our name stands for Phyllis Jordan, our founder who opened her first coffee house over two decades ago. She's one of the pioneers of gourmet coffee - her idea: to create unique coffee blends and roast the beans in small batches - the same way we do it today in our roasting facility not far from Bourbon Street.
name: PJ's Coffee of New Orleans

description:
The Washington Representative Office of the Turkish Industry and Business Association (TÜSİAD) was established in November 1998. Within the general framework of the mission of its parent organization, TUSIAD-US strives to be a conduit for exchange of information between Turkey and the United States in an effort to strengthen political, economic, and business ties.

The Turkish Industry and Business Association (TÜSİAD) was founded in 1971. It is an independent, non-governmental, non-profit entrepreneur organization that represents a large share of the Turkish economy. Member companies account for 85% of Turkey's total foreign trade volume (excluding energy imports), 50% of total private sector employment, and 80% of total corporate taxes. TÜSİAD promotes principles of participatory democracy, a competitive market economy, environmental sustainability, and universal freedoms and human rights. TÜSİAD is a member of BusinessEurope and the Global Business Coalition, and has a strong international network of six representative offices around the world: Washington, D.C., Brussels, Paris, Berlin, London, and Ankara.
name: Turkish Industry and Business Association (TUSIAD) U.S. Representative Office

description:
The Wichita Independent Business Association, founded in May of 1931, has a long tradition of civic participation in the growth of not only businesses in the Wichita area, but the community as a whole. In those early days, the Wichita Independent Business Men’s Association assisted citizens in finding gainful employment during the worst financial disaster in United States history; the Great Depression.

During WWII the organization assisted the war effort and the influence of WIBA can be similarly found in events related to each major, historic milestone of both local and national significance from its founding until the present. Even today, WIBA is highly involved in the community, partnering with the City of Wichita to help grow jobs in the region.

We are also working with Wichita public schools, supporting the efforts of faculty and administrators at Jardine Technology Middle Magnet School, mentoring students and providing monetary assistance to their STEM learning lab. We take a personal approach to work with our member businesses, to help them grow when they are doing well and, perhaps, regenerate when they might be struggling a bit.
name: Wichita Independent Business Association

description:
At Fire Department Coffee, we’re more than just a coffee company — we’re a community united by a shared passion for great coffee and a mission to serve our communities. As a veteran-owned business certified by NaVOBA (National Veteran-Owned Business Association) and NVBDC (National Veteran Business Development Council), we take immense pride in delivering great-tasting coffee that fuels people worldwide.

Inspired by coffee’s vital role in keeping firefighters alert during demanding shifts, Fire Department Coffee was created and run by active and retired firefighters. 

Each batch of our coffee is freshly roasted right here in the U.S.A. From the moment the beans are selected to when they’re brewed into your cup, quality, and dedication go into every step of the process.

Our mission extends beyond just providing premium coffee. We’re committed to giving back to our fellow brothers and sisters who put their lives on the line for others every day. That’s why we established the Fire Department Coffee Charitable Foundation, which is dedicated to supporting first responders facing physical, mental, or other challenges. Just like an energizing cup of coffee, we’re here to provide the support and resources needed to keep our family going strong.
name: Fire Department Coffee

description: Founded in 1909 as a farmer-owned cooperative, Tillamook County Creamery Association (TCCA) recently achieved the distinction as a Certified B Corporation® (B Corp™) and prides itself on its commitment to bringing to market the most consistent, best tasting, highest quality dairy products made in the most natural way possible. Guided by the belief that everyone deserves real food that makes them feel good every day, Tillamook® produces internationally recognized, award-winning cheese as well as exceptional ice cream, butter, cream cheese spreads, yogurt and sour cream, made with unwavering values that never sacrifice or compromise quality for profit. TCCA is owned by a group of farming families, primarily based in Tillamook County, Oregon. TCCA operates production facilities in Tillamook and Boardman, Oregon and employs more than 900 people throughout the state. The Tillamook Creamery is the largest tourist attraction on the coast of Oregon and one of the most popular in the state, attracting more than one million visitors each year. For more information on TCCA and Tillamook, visit Tillamook.com.

description:
Phoenix Community Coffee is a nonprofit coffee roasting organization that imports coffee directly from Latin America, roasts the beans in their facility, and private labels, or “brands”, the packaging for schools, nonprofits, and relief efforts in order help their partners generate financial support. The coffee imported is purchased at an ethical wage from the coffee farms in order to promote economic sustainability in these coffee growing regions as well as provide margin for generous wages for the migrant picker who gathers the beans. 

The vision of Phoenix Community Coffee is to be a source of relief in the community and to partner with groups that are impacting lives. A few community relief efforts they partner with include ending homelessness in Atlanta, stopping the commercial exploitation of children, providing resources for widows and orphans, and much more. They believe that through empowering individuals to direct their resources towards the areas of life they are passionate, each person can be a part of making an impact, both locally and globally. 

By drinking Phoenix Community Coffee, consumers are able to partner with three Great Causes. First, the development and socially just treatment of coffee growers throughout the world. Second, of relief and support to a global community. Third, and most relevant to the consumer, the mission of the partnering organization. 

A coffee company, providing relief to a global community.
name: Phoenix Roasters, Inc.

description:
Craft coffee is not just the morning caffeine kick! Coffee and the cultures and rituals surrounding it reach deeper and further than just a bag of beans. There’s always something new to learn, and we’re here to steep in it—no pun intended! 

\’Crafted\ : 
an occupation or trade requiring manual dexterity or artistic skill

At Cool Crafted Beverage, we are forging a new copacking model for the coffee industry. 

In early 2019, as the Director of Wholesale for Victrola Coffee Roasters and Whidbey Coffee Co., I scoured the market for a copacking operation that matched the quality and experience I was committed to providing my customers. Soon, I became convinced if I was searching, I knew others were too. 

In late 2020, Cool Crafted Beverage, LLC was launched to support the rapidly growing market of cold brew coffee, with an updated and modern approach to food safety, sustainability, and customer education. We are building a business that goes above and beyond the traditional brewing and packaging process. With the Cool Crafted team, you’ll find a true partner who collaborates with you to develop an original, best-in-class cold brew recipe, as well as tools to share the story that goes along with it.

description:
Alghanim Industries is one of the largest, privately-owned companies in the Gulf region. A multi-national company in outlook with operations in 40 countries, Alghanim Industries is a multi-billion dollar conglomerate with more than 30 businesses.

Alghanim Industries acquired Costa Kuwait in July 2013. Since then, Costa Coffee has been focusing on customer service, refurbishing existing stores as well as opening new ones around Kuwait, and refreshing and broadening its product range. Costa Coffee has been in Kuwait since 1998.

In February 2015, Alghanim Industries acquired the exclusive development rights to Wendy's restaurants across the MENA region. All operational outlets in the UAE were acquired as part of the deal, which currently consist of 17 locations across the country, including several locations in Dubai, Abu Dhabi and Sharjah, and opened 1 in Kuwait during 2016 and many more in pipeline in Kuwait and the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia in 2017.

Alghanim Industries place a high value on commitment and investment in our people who contribute to the continued growth and vitalization of our business. Renowned for our progressive business culture and management philosophy, we consider finding and developing talented and energetic people the key to our continued success. 

If you are interested in joining our Food & Beverage Team within operations or our support functions, then please send your CV to fbcareers@alghanim.com.
name: Alghanim Industries - Food and Beverage

description:
To keep our footprint as small as possible, we decided to design and manufacture our own to-go coffee cup. Our 16 oz. Good To Go Cups are made from an innovative compostable polymer. Our cups are less resource-intensive to create than typical reusable cups. 

Our Good To Go Cups are made to be reused and reused and reused. Once you’ve finished your drink, simply return the cup to a participating coffee shop. When you are ready for your next drink, that beverage will be served in a clean reusable cup. At the end of the cup’s life it will be collected and returned to the manufacturer where a portion will be used for new cups and the rest will be composted.
name: Good To Go Cups

description:
MMC Catering Co. was founded in 1996 by Mr. Mishari Al Roudan with a vision of exploring the world of food art and service.

MMC Catering is having the following brands; Le Notre Paris, Meem Cafe, Crimson Garden, Rice Culture on a Tray, Sawah Arabesque, Italo's Cafe.

A sole franchisee in Kuwait of Le Notre Paris, a well reputed name in the field of gastronomy, Le Notre has made an entry to Kuwait market on July 1998 having its diversified business in restaurant, coffee shops, boutique, banqueting and catering. 

Soon after the inauguration of its main location in Gulf Road was the opening of the branch in Al Fanar Mall. It was followed by another two outlets, in Marina Mall on June 2003 an din the Avenues Mall on June 2007.

On the same period of mid 2007, the introduction of two new concepts for Italian and Iranian cuisines was made possible through the birth of Italo's Cafe and Crimson Garden also at Avenues Mall.

On the first quarter of 2009, another two new concepts were launched again at the Avenues Mall, namely Rice Culture on a Tray and Sawah Cafe Arabesque. 

MMC is proud to be always part of prestigious shopping malls, like the opening of Le Notre Cafe and Meem Cafe in 360 Mall on November 2009.

September 2009 marks a big breakthrough with MMC as it unveils a restaurant complex Spoons in Mahboula. A unique stand-alone 4,400 sq. m. complex is dedicated for casual dining where prominent names in the restaurants will be found.

Then, it was followed by Meem Cafe in Hamra Tower.

In just a decade of existence, MMC Catering has already gone a long long way with its proven standard and diversity and will still continue to conquer uniqueness and identity.
name: MMC Catering
